description: Новая часть серии "Загадки ДаВинчи", отличного приложения для любителей всевозможных задачек и вопросов на сообразительность! Умней, играя! PRO-версия не содержит рекламу и ограничений на категории! % Более 1 500 000 активных пользователей серии % Вдумчивая Классика и молниеносная Викторина % Редкие и сложные загадки и головоломки % Русский фольклор % Регулярные обновления Игра будет полезна тем: * Кто хочет нереально прокачать свой IQ * Кто любит бродить по Чертогам Разума (привет Шерлок!) * Кто не терпит интеллектуальных границ * Кто любит такие образовательные игры как Миллионер, Что Где Когда, Самый Умный, Своя Игра (привет Вассерман!) * Кто просто хочет провести вечер с пользой Игра "Загадки ДаВинчи: Викторина" состоит из двух полноценных режимов. Первый режим,“Классика”, включает в себя более 700 загадок в 20 различных категориях. Здесь вы встретите такие темы: - Бизнес (деньги, инвестиции, фирмы) - Великие Люди (Шекспир, Да Винчи и др.) - Города (Санкт-Петербург, Москва, Великий и Нижний Новгород, Лондон) - Искусство (живопись) - История (Древняя, История России, Викинги) - Культура (Китай, Япония) - Литература (Отечественная, Зарубежная) - Наука (Математика, Медицина, Химия) - Русский Фольклор (Быт, Животные, Явления природы) - Спорт (Футбол) - Стиль Жизни (Еда, Фитнес) - Техника (инженеры и их великие изобретения) Изначально открыто по одной загадке в каждой категории. Каждая из отгаданных загадок открывает несколько последующих. Сложность вопросов увеличивается по мере продвижения в категории. Если же вам удалось решить целую категорию головоломок, то вас ждет вознаграждение в виде небольшого количества очков знаний, которые можно тратить на различные бонусы. Новый режим называется “Викторина”, в котором собраны: - Викторина про Футбол - Викторина про Кино - Викторина по Правописанию - Викторина по Географии - Викторина по Наукам (химия,физика,биология,астрономия) - Викторина по ПДД (вопросы из официальных правил дорожного движения) - Викторина про Стиль Жизни (фитнес, iphone и смузи, вот это все) - Викторина про Страны (Россия,Украина, Белоруссия, Казахстан и другие страны СНГ) - Викторина по Математике (несложные примеры на вычисление) И множество других вопросов, связанных с правилами дорожного движения(ПДД), математикой и логотипами к известным мобильным играм, странами и столицами, науками и культурой. На каждый вопрос даётся 10 секунд (да да, погуглить не успеете!) и четыре варианта ответа, а ошибиться за один тур викторины можно всего три раза. Так что нужно быть максимально внимательным и быстро напрягать извилины. ОСОБЕННОСТИ: * Аккуратный минималистичный flat-дизайн, концентрирующий ваше внимание на основном процессе – отгадывании загадок и вопросов. * Множество загадок и вопросов, разбитых на несколько категорий с несколькими подкатегориями. Это всевозможные логические загадки, вопросы связанные с Россией, Украиной, загадки по истории, науке и изобретениям. * Увлекательный режим “Викторина” с более чем 15000 вопросами * Регулярно добавляются новые вопросы и категории в режиме реального времени. Не нужно обновлять, чтобы продолжить играть! * Ставьте рекорды и зарабатывайте достижения * Сражайтесь со случайными соперниками или померяйтесь силами с одним из друзей в Google+ * При помощи игры можно значительно повысить уровень своей орфографии, научиться быстро считать, а расширение кругозора гарантировано! Система достижений также не заставит скучать! Одни из самых трудно зарабатываемых ачивок относятся к режиму «Викторина». Эти достижения названы в честь государственных должностей в Древнем Риме. Например, можно заработать звание Консула или Претора, а также Эдила, Квестора и Цензора. Тестируйте IQ, прокачивайте знания, тренируйте память! Быть эрудированным круто! Мы в соц-сетях: Facebook: http://facebook.com/PlanemoStd Twitter: http://twitter.com/planemo_std Youtube: http://youtube.com/PlanemoStd Вконтакте: http://vk.com/planemostd The new part of the series "Mysteries of Da Vinci", a great application for fans of all sorts of tasks and issues for ingenuity! Smarter by playing! PRO-version does not contain advertising and restrictions on the category! % More than 1.5 million active users series Thoughtful% Classic and lightning Quiz % Rare and difficult riddles and puzzles % Russian folklore % Regular updates The game is useful because: * Who wants unreal pump your IQ * Who loves to roam the Halls of Mind (hello Sherlock!) * Who does not tolerate intellectual boundaries * Who loves such as educational games Millionaire, What Where When the smartest Own Game (Wasserman hi!) * Who just wants to spend the evening with the use of Game "Da Vinci Puzzle Quiz" consists of two full-fledged modes. The first mode, "Classics", includes more than 700 puzzles in 20 different categories. Here you will find topics: - Business (money, investment firm) - Great People (Shakespeare, Da Vinci, etc.) - Cities (St. Petersburg, Moscow, and Nizhny Novgorod the Great, London) - Arts (painting) - History (Ancient, History of Russia, Vikings) - Culture (China, Japan) - Literature (Domestic, Foreign) - Science (Mathematics, Medicine, Chemistry) - Russian Folk (Genesis, Animals, Natural phenomena) - Sports (Football) - Life Style (Food, Fitness) - Technology (engineers and their great inventions) Originally opened one puzzle in each category. Each guessed riddles opens next few. Increased complexity of the issues as we move into the category. If you managed to solve the whole category of puzzles, then you will be rewarded with a small number of points of knowledge that can be spent on various bonuses. New mode called "Quiz", which collected: - Pro Football Quiz - Quiz about Movies - Spelling Quiz - Geography Quiz - Quiz sciences (chemistry, physics, biology, astronomy) - Quiz SDA (questions of the official rules of the road) - Quiz about the Lifestyle (fitness, iphone and smoothies, that's all) - Quiz of countries (Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Kazakhstan and other CIS countries) - Mathematics Quiz (simple examples of the calculation) And many other issues related to the rules of the road (SDA), mathematics, and logos to the famous mobile games, countries and capitals, science and culture. For each question is given 10 seconds (yes, google does not have time!) And four choices, and be mistaken for one round of the quiz can be a total of three times. So we need to be as attentive and quickly strain gyrus. FEATURES: * Neat flat-minimalistic design, concentrating your attention on the main course - guessing riddles and questions. * Lots of puzzles and questions, divided into several categories with several subcategories. These are various logic puzzles, issues related to Russia, Ukraine, the mysteries of history, science and inventions. * Fascinating mode "Quiz" with over 15,000 questions Regularly added new questions and categories in real time. Not need to update to keep playing! * Put records and earn achievements * Fight with random opponents or to measure themselves against one of your friends on Google+ * From games can significantly improve their spelling, learn how to quickly consider and broaden their horizons guaranteed! Achievement system also does not make bored! Some of the most hard earned achivok is valid "Quiz". These achievements are named in honor of public office in Rome. For example, you can earn the title of Consul or Praetor, and Edil, Questor and Censor. Test your IQ, Suck knowledge, train memory! Be erudite cool! We are in social networks: Facebook: http://facebook.com/PlanemoStd Twitter: http://twitter.com/planemo_std Youtube: http://youtube.com/PlanemoStd Vkontakte: http://vk.com/planemostd

description: Download this FREE language pack to use it with your GO Keyboard in Hungarian . Enjoy your every tap and personalize your keyboard! Are you bored with plain android keyboard? We offer the personalized and customized keyboard, from theme, font to key tone, etc. GO Keyboard is a Emoji Free keyboard that delivers smart auto-correction and a user-friendly interface. It supports 60+ languages. The symbols in the keyboard are compatible across all popular apps, including Facebook, SMS, Gmail, Whatsapp, etc. The most important for us - always listening to your feedback! FAQ 1. How to use dictionary pack and enable GO Keyboard on my mobile? Step 1: Download and install Hungarian FOR GO Keyboard Step 2: Click open GO Keyboard icon from home menu, and click through 2 steps to enable GO Keyboard and set as default one; Step 3: Click into Settings -> Languages -> Select your language For more fun and info, follow us on FACEBOOK: http://goo.gl/kLxbSl MORE FEATURES: ★ FREE 800 Emoji and other cute smiley faces explosion (ʘ‿ʘ) It is free to use a pack of 800 emoticons, emoji, and smiley faces. They are grouped into different categories so you are able to find it real fast. ★ PERSONALIZED EXPERT - type fun There are 10000+ colorful themes in market that are compatible with GO Keyboard and new free themes are delivered weekly ! You could also set keyboard background wallpaper image free. Plus, we have several features to make your typing more fun. Voice recorder can transfer your voice into a different one and it is so fun to send to your friends. ★ WORD CORRECTION and suggestions Smart enough to recognize mistyping and provide correction suggestions to you. Sloppy typing is away from you. ★ TYPE what you speak It supports voice input and it frees your hand. ★ GREEN and Pro It is small(smaller than most of the keyboards), green and professional. ★ PRIVACY and security We will never collect your personal info including credit card information. However, you may receive a warning when activating GO Keyboard saying “This keyboard may collect your personal data.” The warning message is just a standard message in Android for ANY third-party keyboard app, so don’t worry.

Zombie Hunter is a best zombie arcade game! As evil organization held a secret ritual of summoning, the zombie king awake again! In its leadership, various zombies flocked human city, the whole world into a panic! How to play: - Tap on screen to firing. - Drag skill-icon to release the skill power. - Click the left/right arrow to switch the gun. Master guide: ● Upgrade fortifications early to deal with unexpected situations. ● Get through the checkpoints as soon as possible, so you can get more powerful guns. ● Smart use of free skills, you can do more with less. ● Numerous guns, and each has a unique attribute and shooting mode. ● You can strengthen the character of the various attributes that make role has a unique way to grow. ● Unique crafted game map, experience the exotic scenery. ● The final stage of each map, there will be a special BOSS awaits your challenge. Free to play this action tower defense game!

description: Originele, oorspronkelijke oproepen voor ambulance, politie en brandweer uit heel Nederland nagenoeg real-time op je telefoon of tablet? Alarmfase 1 biedt het. Oftewel, nog voordat een brandweerauto de kazerne verlaat, weet jij al wat er aan de hand is. Je krijgt dezelfde oproep, slechts enkele seconden nadat deze verstuurd is aan de oorspronkelijke hulpdiensten in de app of als notificatie! 112 meldingen. * Let op: De politie maakt weinig gebruik van dit systeem, je zult dus niet veel politieberichten zien. Ook sommige ambulance korpsen maken gebruik van een ander systeem. * Eerste week (altijd) gratis: Voor iedereen geldt: Installeer de app en neem een gratis "Weekabonnement", de eerste week heb je de volledige functionaliteit gratis en kun je zelf ervaren wat Alarmfase 1 doet. * Wat vind je van Alarmfase 1? Wij zijn nieuwsgierig, laat je review achter in Google play, maar mocht je daarnaast ons iets willen laten weten, stuur je bericht naar: info@alarmfase1.nl * Hinder nooit de hulpdiensten in de uitoefening van hun functie! Original, original calls for ambulance, police and fire departments throughout the Netherlands almost real time on your phone or tablet? Alarm Phase 1 offers. In other words, before a fire engine leaving the station, you already know what is going on. You get the same call, just seconds after it is sent to the original emergency services in the app or notification! 112 messages. * Note: Police make little use of this system, you will not see many police posts. Also, some ambulance corps use a different system. * First week (always) free: Applies to everyone: Install the app and take a free "Week Subscription," the first week you will have full functionality for free and you too can experience what Alarmfase 1. * What do you think of Alarm Phase 1? We are curious, leave your review behind in Google play, but if you also want to let us know something, send your message to: info@alarmfase1.nl * Nuisance never emergency services in the discharge of their duties!
release_text: Meldingen delen, geluiden personaliseren, streetview en navigatie toegevoegd. Verder nog enkele kleine bugfixes.

description: Neu! Die No.1 Wetter Widgets für Österreich für Ihren Startscreen. Mit Uhr! Jetzt mit den Wetterdaten von allen Orten Österreichs inklusive aktueller Temperatur, Tagesdetaildaten oder 4-Tagesprognose. Jetzt PACK No.1 in folgenden Größen verfügbar: 2x4 (4x2), 1x4 (4x1) und 1x1. ANLEITUNG: Nach dem Downloaden am Homescreen linke Taste am Handy drücken. Mit "+ Hinzufügen" und "Widget" gelangt man in die Auswahlliste. Einfach Widgetgröße auswählen und Ort festlegen. Fertig! Mit den Wetterdaten von ZAMG von Wien, Graz, Linz, Innsbruck, Salzburg, St. Pölten, Klagenfurt, Eisenstadt, Bregenz und über 20.000 weiteren Orten. Wetter Widget ist eine free app, steht gratis zum Download bereit und wird von allen Mobilfunkanbietern A1, T-Mobile, 3 unterstützt. New! The No.1 weather widgets Austria for your start screen. With clock! Now with the weather data from all resorts in Austria including current temperature, daily detail data or 4-day forecast. Now PACK No.1 available in the following sizes: 2x4 (4x2), 1x4 (4x1) and 1x1. INSTRUCTIONS: After downloading press on home screen left button on the phone. Use the "+ Add" and "widget" you can go into the selection list. Simply choose your widget size and specify location. Ready! With the weather data from ZAMG of Vienna, Graz, Linz, Innsbruck, Salzburg, St. Pölten, Klagenfurt, Eisenstadt, Bregenz and over 20,000 other locations. Weather widget is a free app, available free for download and is supported by all three mobile operators A1, T-Mobile,.

description: Chubby Frog is a platform game that tests your reflexes, coordination and memory. Jump matching the color of the frog with the blocks. Try to collect all the worms and avoid the wasps, over 25 stages!

Avec "Mon CA" du Crédit Agricole de Lorraine, emportez votre banque partout avec vous ! - Visualisez et gérez rapidement vos comptes bancaires en toute sécurité (utilisation d'une connexion chiffrée https) - Trouvez les agences et distributeurs du Crédit Agricole de Lorraine (géolocalisation et ,réalité augmentée) - Profitez d'actualités générales ainsi que selon votre profil - Consultez les tarifs en vigueur - Simulez vos projets - Simulez votre épargne - Comparez notre offre de crédit - Conversion de devises - Contactez directement les numéros d'urgence en cas de besoin (opposition, litige, ...) - Enregistrez les coordonnées de votre conseiller - Prise de rendez-vous - Liste d'applications du Groupe Crédit Agricole - Enregistrez votre agence préférentielle - Accéder au site CA Mozaïc (Profil Particuliers activé) - Accéder au site Pleinchamp (Profil Agriculteurs activé) - Personnaliser l'interface de l'application - Recommander l'application 1. Avec la fonction "Comptes", visualisez l’état de vos comptes, la liste des opérations réalisées, effectuez des virements entre vos comptes et réalisez des opérations de bourse (pour les clients disposant de cette option). 2. Accéder au site au site CA Mozaïc (Profil Particuliers activé) et Pleinchamp (Profil Agriculteurs activé) 3. Grâce à la fonctionnalité "Agences", accédez à la liste de nos agences, consultez leurs horaires et services disponibles et contactez-les directement par mail ou par téléphone. Aussi, avec la géolocalisation, visualisez où se trouve l’agence la plus proche de vous et récupérez l'itinéraire pour vous y rendre facilement. Grâce à la nouvelle fonction de réalité augmentée, retrouvez plus simplement les agences autour de vous. 4. Bénéficiez d’actualités mises à jour régulièrement et de bons plans avec la rubrique "Actus". Il est possible de choisir différents thèmes d'actualités via le panneau de réglages. 5. Consultez nos "Tarifs" en vigueur pour les Particuliers, Professionnels et Entreprises. 6. Réalisez des "Simulations" sur les livrets d'épargne et estimez le montant de vos crédits pour préparer vos futurs projets. 7. Comparez notre offre de crédit avec le "Comparateur de Crédits". 8. Convertir des devises avec le "Convertisseur" de devises. 9. Retrouvez tous les numéros d'urgence dans l'univers "Contacts". Vous pourrez contacter directement votre assurance en cas d’accident ou litige, le centre d’opposition en cas de perte ou vol de moyens de paiement ou encore contacter notre hotline si vous rencontrez des problèmes d’utilisation. Vous pourrez aussi nous contacter par mail pour nous faire part de remarques, problèmes ou suggestions. 10. Avec la fonction de "Prise de Rendez-vous", visualisez les disponibilités de votre conseiller et prenez rendez-vous avec lui facilement. 11. Retrouvez la liste de toutes les "Applications" du Groupe Crédit Agricole disponibles (Kwixo, PacifiCA, …) 12. Définissez votre agence de gestion , ainsi que les coordonnées de votre conseiller (dans la partie "Réglages"). Pratique ! Leurs coordonnées seront alors enregistrées dans votre carnet d’adresses. Une fois définis, vous pourrez retrouver votre agence dans la rubrique "Agences" et votre conseiller dans la rubrique "Contacts". 13. Vous pouvez maintenant personnaliser l'interface de l'application parmi 4 thèmes disponibles via le panneau de réglages: basic, coloré, sobre ou décalé, à vous de choisir! 14. Vous pouvez envoyer des documents et pièces justificatives directement à votre conseiller (Contacts) With "My CA" Crédit Agricole Lorraine, take your bank with you everywhere! - View and manage your bank accounts quickly safely (using an encrypted https connection) - Find agencies and distributors Crédit Agricole Lorraine (geolocation and augmented reality) - Enjoy general news and according to your profile - Check the current rates - Simulate your projects - Simulate your savings - Compare our offer credit - Currency Converter - Direct contact Emergency numbers need (opposition, litigation, ...) - Save contact your advisor - Making appointments - Application List Crédit Agricole Group - Save your preferred agency - Access the CA website Mozaïc (Personal Profile enabled) - Access to the website Pleinchamp (Profile Farmers enabled) - Customize the application interface - Recommend the application 1. With the "Accounts" function, see the status of your accounts, the list of transactions, make transfers between your accounts and make transactions price (for customers with this option). 2. Access the site at CA website Mozaïc (Personal Profile enabled) and Pleinchamp (Profile Farmers enabled) 3. With the feature "Agencies", go to our list of agencies, check their schedules and services available and contact them directly by email or phone. Also, with geolocation, visualize where is the closest agency and recover the route to get there easily. With the new function of augmented reality, simply find the agencies around you. 4. Get news updates regularly and deals with the "News". You can choose different themes news via the settings panel. 5. See our "Rates" in force for Individuals, Professionals and Companies. 6. Perform "Simulations" on savings accounts and estimate the amount of your credit plan your future projects. 7. Compare our credit offer with the "Compare Credits". 8. Convert currency with the "converter" currency. 9. Find all emergency numbers in the universe "Contacts". You can directly contact your insurance in case of accident or dispute, the center of opposition in case of loss or theft of means of payment or contact our hotline if you encounter problems using. You can also contact us by email to give us comments, problems or suggestions. 10. With the function "Taking Appointments", view the availability of your advisor and make an appointment with him easily. 11. Find a list of all the "Applications" of the Crédit Agricole Group available (Kwixo Pacifica ...) 12. Define your management agency and contact your advisor (in the "Settings"). Practice! Their details will then be saved in your address book. Once defined, you can find an agency under the heading "Agencies" and your counselor in the "Contacts" section. 13. You can now customize the application interface from 4 themes available via the settings panel: basic, colorful, sober or shifted, the choice is yours! 14. You can send supporting documents and your consultant directly (Contacts)

Reservations core chat, ultra-small package, saving memory, chat more fun! description: 디지털 멀티미디어 매거진으로 즐기는 나만의 방송! 다양한 기능과 컨텐츠를 제공하는 매거진K 를 소개합니다. KBS의 오프라인 출판물이 국내 최초로 Html5를 이용한 디지털 멀티미디어 매거진으로 서비스 됩니다. KBS 대표 드라마와 다큐멘터리 등이 다이나믹한 표현을 가미한 디지털 화보집으로 제작되고 동영상, 오디오 서비스까지 이용하실 수 있습니다. 디지털 버전으로 KBS 저널에서 KBS의 인기 드라마화보, 다큐화보까지 다양한 KBS의 컨텐츠들이 진열되며 새로운 매거진들이 주기적으로 업데이트 됩니다. 멀티미디어를 이용한 매거진K는 개인화 서비스를 제공해 마이북, 책갈피, 매거진 카테고리 순서설정 등편리한 기능을 제공하며 오프라인 컨텐츠에서는 볼 수 없는 다이나믹한 표현과 동영상, 오디오 서비스를 제공합니다. KBS 매거진K를 감상할 수 있는 즐거움! 이 모든 콘텐츠의 이용은 무료입니다. 매주 새롭게 KBS의 이야기로 풍요로운 컨텐츠와 즐거움을 주는 매거진K로 KBS의 다양한 공간을 즐기세요. [주요 서비스] ㅇ Html5를 이용한 새로운 동적 컨텐츠 ㅇ 동영상, 오디오 컨텐츠 서비스 ㅇ 카테고리별 매거진 보기 및 매거진 순서 변경 ㅇ 나만의 매거진을 관리할 수 있는 마이북과 책갈피 기능 ㅇ 주요 매거진 컨텐츠 SNS 아웃 포스팅 keyword : KBS, KBS매거진, 매거진K, manazine k, kbs저널, 화보, 멀티미디어매거진, 브라질, 월드컵, FIFA, worldcup Enjoying digital multimedia broadcasting your own magazine! We introduce K magazine that provides a range of features and content. The service in the digital multimedia magazine for the first time in Korea's KBS using Html5 offline publications. KBS representatives such as drama and documentary production and consideration of the dynamic representation of digital Photos Available to the video and audio service. A digital version pictorial, in the journal to the popular KBS drama KBS documentary and pictorial display of the KBS variety of content that is updated regularly with new magazines are. K using multimedia magazine offers convenient features such as My Book, Bookmarks, magazine category order set provides personalized service and provides a dynamic representation of the video and audio service offline, you can not see the content. Pleasure to watch KBS Magazine K! All this content is free for use. Giving pleasure to the story of the rich content with weekly new KBS Enjoy a variety of KBS in the magazine space K. description: Dapatkan maklumat Islam bersumberkan Wikipedia dibuat khas utk kemudahan anda. Aplikasi ini berlatarbelakangkan maklumat berkaitan Islam dari wikipedia dan dibentangkan dengan penampilan yang berbeza khas untuk kemudahan pengguna Android. Makluman: Aplikasi ini hanyalah untuk mempermudahkan pembacaan maklumat berkaitan Islam yang terkandung didalam Wikipedia dan bukanlah panduan lengkap berkenaan dengan Islam. Topik-topik lain akan ditambah berdasarkan permintaan pengguna. Akan datang: - Rukun Islam - Rukun Iman Get information sourced from Wikipedia Islam made especially for your convenience. This application background information on Islam from Wikipedia and is presented with a different appearance typical for the convenience of users of Android. Note: This application is only to facilitate the reading of Islam related information contained in the article and is not a complete guide on Islam. Other topics will be added based on user requests. Next: - Pillars of Islam - Pillars of Faith

description: SlimPlan helps you to develop and follow your own diet, work-out and beauty treatment plans. You can track your progress and fine tune the plan on a daily basis. Everyone who is serious about being fit knows that sustainable results require right nutrition, regular work-out, personal care and persistence. Set a specific weight loss goal by certain important date and get the results you want. Or create a long-term comprehensive fitness plan and follow it persistently. SlimPlan will help you to track your efforts and progress. Let the SlimPlan become your journal to keep a story of your great victory over yourself. The comparison functionality will show you real changes of your body over the course of a diet/training. All your data is password-protected: upload your pictures to the gallery without worrying that someone else could see them. Name the milestones of your weight loss plan or diet, compare the effectiveness of different systems. We wish you the very best and believe you will do great! description: Have you ever felt the need to keep track of your travel.... If your answer is "YES" then you are at the right place. My Travel Meter is a GPS based application that keeps track of your travel. The application displays a SpeedOMeter with different parameters viz. Distance, Altitude, Max Speed. The application stores the travel start point & end points' latitude and longitude, maximum speed, distance covered, time taken for the travel so that you can refer it in the future... Once the GPS signal is stable, hit the 'Start My Travel' button at the starting point of your travel. In the next screen you will be shown an analog display of the speedOMeter, along with other parameters. There's a play and stop button provided on the top center of the screen to start and stop the travel session. During the travel you can refer the map for the current location by clicking the maps icon provided in the screen. Once your travel is completed click the Stop button to end the travel session. You can refer to this details anytime in the future by just selecting the History option in the Menu. Satellite, Road and Terrain views are included in the maps.... Steps: 1. To start the travel hit the start button and similarly to stop the travel hit the stop button. 2. During the travel if you wish to view the current location hit the maps icon on the screen. 3. To change the mapview Click Menu button -> Layers -> Select Appropriate view 4. To view previous travel details Menu -> History -> Select the travel name from the list. You will be provided with a map consisting of your start and end point. Screens provided in the Application 1. Home Screen: The home screen makes sure that the GPS signal is stable before the application is used. Once the application is stable hit the Start My Travel button to move on to the next screen. View History button is provided so that you can view your previous travel details 2. Meter Screen This screen shows up an analog Speedometer along with other parameters viz. Distance covered, Altitude, Maximum speed, Total Distance covered etc. The button on the top left corner shows the start point and your current position. The button in the top center is used to start and stop the travel session. A graphical representation of the speed in given at the bottom. Hit the menu button to set the units or to view the history... 3.History Screen (Map View): Marker with green color denotes the Start point Marker with red color denotes the end point The inverted Triangular marker denotes the current position suggestions are always welcome.... In case of any issues please contact contactdeveloper007@gmail.com Your active participation is cordially invited to improve the quality of the apps. Help us to serve you better...

Body Fat Calculator and Bmi Calculator This application uses an advanced formula, that takes into consideration not only your height, weight and waist, but also the hip, neck, wrist and forearm circumference (for women), in order to provide the most accurate body fat estimate you can get without specialized equipment. A person's body fat percentage is the total weight of the person's fat divided by the person's weight and consists of essential body fat and storage body fat. The body fat percentage is a good measure of an individual's fitness level, as it is the only body measurement which directly calculates the particular individual's body composition without regard to the individual's height or weight. The widely-used body mass index (BMI) provides a measure that allows for the comparison of individuals of different heights in terms of their weight. Due to differences in body composition the BMI is not necessarily an accurate indicator of body fat, for example individuals with greater than average muscle mass will have a higher BMI. Many bodybuilding and weightlifting enthusiasts measure their bodyfat percentage using a caliper skinfold test - a professional body fat caliper that measures the thickness of a fold of your skin with its underlying layer of fat. This is the most accurate way to measure your bodyfat, but unless you have the specialized caliper this free app provides the most detailed way to monitor your body composition and the effects of your exercise routine on your body, whether you are a gymrat, powerlifting fan, and bodybuilder or just trying to stay in shape.

Tricky Colors is a fast paced mind bending color game that will confuse you and possibly make you rage. It might just make you hate the freaking colors. Reversi is a very challenging board game for all ages. The rules of Reversi are much simpler than any other board games. However, easy to learn doesn't mean easy to play well. It offers so many strategic possibilities, that you can spend the rest of your life to master it. Ultima Reversi Pro is an implementation of Reversi, having many great features to customize the game and make it more interesting. Challenge your strategic skills with Ultima Reversi Pro! ===== FEATURES ===== * 1-player mode (Human vs CPU) * 2-players mode (Human vs Human). * Watching mode (CPU vs CPU). * 10 levels of difficulty. * Scoreboard and rating system. * Various board size (4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7, 8x8, 9x9, 10x10) and various board color. * Various rules (normal mode, 4 stage handicap modes and 2 variant modes). * Other various options (CPU Level Auto-maching, Alternate first move, etc.) * Support tablet size devices. You can enjoy with your family or friends in a tablet! Differences from free version as follow. * No ads. * Board size 9x9 and 10x10 are available. ===== REVERSI RULES ===== * The game begins with each player having two discs on a board. * The players alternate turns, each adding an additional disc on the board. * A valid move must capture at least one of the opponent's discs. This is done by surrounding it, either vertically, horizontally, or diagonally (or a combination of all three). When this occurs, the opponent's discs that you have surround become yours. * If one player cannot make a valid move, the player must pass and the other player plays again. * The game is over when the entire board is filled or when no side can make a valid move. * The winner of the game is the one with the most discs when the game is over. NOTES: Ultima Reversi Pro has an "Auto Pass" feature that automatically passes your turn if you have no other move available and must pass.

description: Note: This early release does not work properly with every device. If you have problems, please send me an error report. I will fix the problem as soon as possible. Update: I solved the OutOfMemoryException error in version 0.2.1 Update 2: The new WYSIWYG engine will work on most devices. But some dialogs are too big for small devices in the act. Release (0.3). I will fix this issue with the next release. - WYSIWYG HTML Editor The WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) html editor is a office like text editor to simplify web content creation. With this App you get common word processor features directly into your android device. - Filesystem With the new, open and save toolbar functions you can edit new or existing files and save your work on the persistent storage of your android device. - Paste from Web Avoid having to modify text pasted from World Wide Web with the 'Paste' feature. Everything is done for you by the copy & paste function. - Safe undo function With the WYSIWYG html editor you don't need worry about mistakes because actions can be safely reverted with the undo/redo functions. - UI language The WYSIWYG html editor can automatically detect your language and localizes the app interface accordingly. The editor is translated into several languages! - Quality XHTML output The editor uses W3C DTD controls to ensure that your HTML code is properly generated and your html will easily validate. - Links The editor makes it easy to add links to the html page. No matter if you want to link websites, e-mails (with refilled subject) or any kind of online resource. - Maximum experience The more you see the better. The editor fills the entire available space. No Ads, no title bar or anything else will disturb your editing experience. - Alignment You can start your app in landscape or portrait mode. The alignment of your editor is fixed while you are writing. To change the alignment you have to restart the app. - HTML source For those who want to have full control over the html structure, this feature makes it easy to control the html sources of the edited content. - Many more features Images, tables, smilies , color, templates, form creation tools, etc. - Using CKEditor 4 - Copyright (c) 2003-2014, CKSource - Frederico Knabben. description: Symantec™ PGP Viewer for Android requires a managed account on a Symantec Encryption Management Server with the LDAP Directory Synchronization feature enabled. Symantec PGP Viewer decrypts, verifies, and displays PGP-encrypted text on devices running Google Android™ software. It complements an enterprise strategy for email encryption and provides mobile users with the ability to access their messages and attachments anywhere, even when offline. Users access their emails through the standard Android mail app, eliminating the need for alternative mail client software or access to the web to read messages. By using encrypted email, organizations can ensure that no unauthorized users can access encrypted sensitive email on the device. It ensures that the information stays protected until it is decrypted, no matter where it goes, even if the device is lost or stolen. Users can: • Decrypt messages encoded in the OpenPGP format • Decrypt attachments, such as email attachments and PGP/MIME messages • Verify digital signatures, to ensure that the message has not been tampered • View messages to see the content PGP Viewer is a part of the email encryption product family available from Symantec. The email encryption family includes options for desktop email (on Apple Mac OS X and Microsoft Windows systems), gateway email encryption, and mobile devices (including Apple iOS devices). Important Information Before Installing: Symantec Encryption Management Server provides user administration and key management for enterprise deployments of this application. Users must enroll with a Symantec Encryption Management Server for administrative services and to load credentials into the devices. This feature helps organizations stay in control of their Android device usage with their encrypted email environment and ensure that usage adhere to corporate policy. This application does not support a standalone mode for key management, and will not work with self-generated keys. In addition, organizations using end-to-end email encryption must have Symantec Desktop Email Encryption from Symantec installed on their workstation to access encrypted messages on their primary computer. Your email administrator will need to provide you with the details for one of the following methods in order to enroll with Symantec Encryption Management Server. 1) Auto Setup: In order to use Auto Setup, your email administrator must provide you with a configuration file via email. This file will allow you to complete the enrollment process without typing in most of the details. 2) Manual Setup: This process requires entering the hostname of the Symantec Encryption Management Server, along with your username and password. If your organization uses a proxy, this information is necessary as well.

With this app you have the map of Vienna right in your pocket! It offers an interactive map that lets you browse the city at amazing detail. Additionally, it comes with a search index for locating streets, but also other points of interest such as museums, restaurants, cafés, hotels, sights and many more. After installing the app, no internet access is required anymore, neither for browsing the map nor for using the search functionality. As a result, the map loads reliably fast and it helps you reducing your data usage to stay within the limits of your data plan. Even if you're a tourist and do not have any mobile data plan at all, the map works equally well, independent of WIFI connectivity. Features: * 100% offline and up-to-date, because the map data comes from the OpenStreetMap project. * Browse the map on different zoom levels. * Display your current location on the map. * Find streets by name, but also other points of interest like attractions, museums, hotels, and many more. * In the premium edition you can also sort points of interest by their distance and apply other search filters. * Select the elements visible on the map.

description: TextGrabber + Translator easily extracts snippets of text from a variety of printed sources by using the device’s camera. You can digitize printed information and translate it into any of more than 40 languages anywhere anytime. ***** Winner of SUPERSTAR Award in the “Text Input” category in the Mobile Star Awards ***** Just take a picture of the text, and you can immediately edit and translate it, share via e-mail and SMS, or transfer it directly to other applications installed on your device - social networks, online storage services, etc. With TextGrabber + Translator you can scan and translate: • Documents • Receipts • Notes • Articles • Book fragments • Manuals and instructions • Product ingredients, etc. ------------------------ MAIN FEATURES: • Accurate Internet-free text recognition in more than 60 languages, including English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Greek, Chinese, Korean and others. • Captured text can be easily edited or copied to the clipboard • Instant translation from more than 40 languages (please note: an Internet connection is required for translation) • Fast & convenient information sharing via email or SMS • One-tap transferring of recognition results to other applications - social networks, online storage services, etc. via Android ‘Share’ function • Search engine support • All captured texts are stored in the app and can be easily found anytime in the “History” folder. ------------------------ SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: 3 mega pixels camera or more with autofocus An Internet connection is not required for OCR! OCR HINT: Please select the appropriate language (up to three at a time) before recognition ------------------------ ABBYY Mobile on Facebook: http://fb.com/abbyymobile FOLLOW US on Twitter @ABBYY_Mobile

Tap the jump button to make the cavemen jump, but watch out for the flying Pterodactyls! Time jumps perfectly to try and avoid getting trapped! Get creative with double jumps for an extra challenge. Collect coins on the way which can be used to purchase tomahawks. In a scenario where you can't dodge a dino? Throw a tomahawk! The longer you last, the harder the game gets. It's time for Dinosaur Dodge!

description: http://www.alienthink.com/posetool.html Breakthrough horse posing tool for the artist. You can create any pose quickly with an easy to use pose interface. The Horse Pose Tool 3D was designed by the Artist Riven Phoenix who brought you super hit 'Pose Tool 3D' app for figure drawing artists. He is also the author of 'The Famous Figure Drawing Course HD' used in over 68 Countries. His Pose Tool 3D app was declared the top 10 must have art apps by imagineFX magazine. The Pose Tool uses state-of-the-art 3D Engine that allows you to pose a organic horse model. Touch Controls: - One Finger - Orbit around figure - One Finger Tap - Select body part - Two Finger Pinch - Zoom in and Out and Pan at the same time. This feature gives you the ability to setup dramatic shots for your poses quickly. Very powerful feature. description: The beloved lovely animal farm jigsaw puzzle app with a lot of funny animals. The top hit app by kids worldwide! Download it now and test it for free to see for yourself why this game is loved by so many kids and toddlers! The farm animal game is made for kids age 2 to 8 years. With this free animal farm app, your child will learn playfully the animals on the farm. All important animals are included, like cows, horses, pig, donkey, dog, cat, frog, chicken, sheep, bee and many many more! The perfect children's puzzle game app with lovely illustrated animal graphics. The app was designed for little boys and girls alike! Features: + 15 puzzles - your kid learns about the different farm animals such as horse, cat, dog, cow, sheep, pig, rabbit, duck, frog and more. + 3 difficulty levels to choose from - so your child can slowly increase and is not overwhelmed. The preschool farm animal puzzle collection is suitable for toddlers and childrens. + Always new arrangement of the pieces of the puzzle - the tots puzzle is always exciting and varied for your kid. + For each correctly solved puzzle your child will receive a reward like funny bursting ballons. + Beautifully illustrated puzzle app with high-resolution graphics. + No third-party advertising. + Parental control With this lite farm animal puzzle app learning and playing makes fun! The cute farm animal puzzle promotes hand-eye coordination, logical thinking and your child's memory skills. The perfect preschool learning puzzle game app for your toddler and kid! Girls and boys worldwide love this puzzle. The perfect mix of funny animals on the farm and the choosable difficulty of each puzzle level makes this app such a beloved game. You don´t need to buy a 'real' expensive jigsaw puzzle and you also never need to look for those missing pieces everywhere again. If you have questions about our games for kids and toddlers or are interested in how we develop our apps together with children, send an email to: support@mcpeppergames.com Please note: Rating the app and writing a review will help us create more apps for children. Thank you! Your McPeppergames team

One, two, three start! If you rather play word games better than number games, this is for you! Look at the scrambled picture puzzle and try to guess the word. If you like word quiz games like 4 PICS 1 WORD PUZZLE PLUS, 2 PICS 1 PHRASE WORD GAME and 5 LITTLE CLUES 1 WORD, than you'll love this new family game! Tap on the picture tiles to switch their positions and reveal a portion of the original image. Play with your friends and kids. Look at the worldwide collection of pictures and guess the word! Key features: • almost 300 puzzles to solve • 3 special levels • available in six languages (English, French, Spanish, German and Russian) Get together and have good family fun! Special hint: if you see a dark tunnel ahead of you and want to see the white light, ask your kids to help you, you will be surprised by what they can do!

description: 28 comes with awesome visuals and sound effect which is something of a standard for games coming from the Feathersoft stables. Game developers at Feathersoft has ensured not just a smooth gameplay but also successfully brought in the right ambience with the gaming table and color scheme which is evocative of poker tables and casinos with the right sound effect to complete the portrayal. 28 consists of 4 players with 2 players facing each other forming a team. 32 cards from a standard 56 card deck is used to play. There are eight cards in each of the usual "French" suits: hearts, diamonds, clubs and spades. The aim is to win tricks with valuable cards. Jack and Nine being the highest value cards at 3 and 2 points respectively followed by aces and tens at 1 point and K, Q, 8 & 7 with 0 points.

A superb map & route planner for the Rome Metro, Tram & Urban rail networks. KEY FEATURES ● Simple, fast and easy to use ● Designed for the first time visitor and experienced commuter ● Unique "Minute Map" feature provides a view of travel times from any location on the map. ● Professionally drawn colourful and clear map with geographical features and places of interest ● Comprehensive offline routing with map & text views ● Planned route animates on the map ● Online street map integration (when an internet connection is available) ● Places of interest, parks etc are built in to the application ● Services can be turned on or off, routing around problems. ● Works in both landscape and portrait modes ● Easily locates your nearest transport stop ● GPS location & tracking ● Inbuilt search ● No internet connection required See www.zuti.co.uk for more info

Simple battery widget. Clicking on the widget opens the battery usage statistics. Depending on the condition of the battery shows 4 colors: - Green - 31-100% - Orange - 16-30% - Red - 0-15% - Blue - charging It is possible to display the temperature of the battery in C or F. This is a widget. To add to your desktop, hold your finger on the desktop and choose Widgets.

Magnetic stud finder app puts an handy stud finder in everyone's pocket at no cost. Even if already having your own stud finder, this app provides a valuable second source. Magnetic stud finder app consists of a customized metal detector with a bubble level view. It can be used for both metal and wood studs. Steel nails/screws are used to fix drywall to the wood studs. Magnetic stud finder finds wood studs by identifying the location of nails and screws. The bubble level is another tool for handyman. The app can also be used as detector for all ferromagnetic objects. To make the best out of it, it is very important to use this app properly. We provide help within the app. More information is provided in our website www.goldsequence.com. You can also see this instruction video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dZmd5vkag7o We have tested this app in multiple buildings with different phones. It works pretty well for drywall if used properly. Even if you cover the drywall with a extra layer of 1/4 inch thick ceramic tile, the app can still work. That being said, the app is not without its limits. This app won't work well if the variation of magnetic field strength becomes too weak to pick up. For example, if you live in a old house with plaster wall and the plaster layer is more than 1/4 inch thick, the app will probably not work well. Even if your house uses drywall, if the size of the drywall screws is too small, it could generate problems for this app. So we agree that this app is not for every house. However, we do believe that it can do good things for many people in many houses.

PreMD Tracker was created by two pre-med students from the Johns Hopkins University and the University of Pittsburgh, along with advice from pre-med school advisors and our fellow pre-med peers. The creators of PreMD Tracker are currently MS1 students at the NYU School of Medicine and The Commonwealth Medical College. We ourselves have journeyed through this long medical school application process, and we created PreMD Tracker as a valuable tool we wished that we had from the very beginning as college freshman. We have pulled together many insider tips and internet links we gained through our own pre-med experiences and specifically designed PreMD Tracker to help simplify and lay out not only what will be expected of you, but how you will be expected to complete, document, and track your progress in order to smoothly and successfully complete the pre-med and medical school application process. This app is up-to-date for the 2015 Application Cycle Why is PreMD Tracker unique? 1. ACTIVITY TRACKER - Allows you to track hours and document your medical, community, research, and additional activities in much the same way you will document them on your AMCAS Primary Application. 2. EXPORT PreMD Tracker CV- PreMD Tracker automatically compiles all of your entered Activities information and allows you to “Export a PreMD Tracker CV” in spreadsheet format via email with the click of a button. 3. SCIENCE (BCPM) GPA CALCULATOR AND TRACKER - Allows you to easily track your required pre-med classes, additional science classes, and automatically calculates your AMCAS BCPM (Science) GPA for you. 4. LETTERS OF REC TRACKER - Reveals the types of letters medical schools expect from you, and allows you to easily track the status of your letters of recommendation and enter recommender names. 5. TIPS AND LINKS - Ample tips and internet links are associated with each section to help ensure your questions are answered to become a competitive medical school applicant. (ie. What do I major in? Who and how do I ask to write me a letter of recommendation? What is AAMC?..and much much more!) 6. GENERAL INFORMATION - Ample information and internet links over-viewing the AMCAS Primary Application, listing the ideal medical school application timeline, and considering important topics beyond the Primary Application such as finding the right school, secondary applications, interviews, and taking a gap year--- just to name a few! 7. PRE-MED SUPPORT - We are here to support and guide you throughout your pre-med process. Should you have any questions about being a pre-med student, the medical school application process, or our app, please don’t hesitate to contact us! Website: premdtracker.weebly.com Twitter: @preMDtracker Facebook: www.facebook.com/premdtracker Email: premdtracker@gmail.com
release_text: PreMD Tracker is excited to release its new tracking system. Introducing "Color Spheres" on the homepage and color-coded Hours in the Activities menu. The updated tracking system will help pre-meds more easily track their overall standing within the application process.

SFR TV : Vos programmes TV au doigt et à l’œil ! Retrouvez sur votre smartphone et votre tablette : * Une large sélection de chaînes TV (1) en Haute Qualité vidéo (HQ) * De la TV à la Demande (REPLAY) en Haute Qualité vidéo (HQ) (1). * Un guide TV complet sur toutes les chaînes de votre offre. * Une sélection de radios FM. Et avec une nouvelle offre box TV Fibre de SFR, toutes vos passions sont au menu avec les chaînes TV BY NUMERICABLE ! Uniquement avec une offre box de SFR, profitez : * De la Vidéo à la Demande à regarder en streaming ou en téléchargement (2) * Des principales chaînes TV des bouquets premium (3) * Des services TV à distance comme la programmation et la lecture d’un enregistrement (4). Transformez également votre smartphone ou tablette en télécommande de votre box (5) ou en manette de jeu (6). Sans oublier … * La compatibilité SFR TV avec la clef Chromecast pour profiter de votre Extra Canalplay sur grand écran (7). * Grâce à Android Wear, la possibilité de piloter votre TV depuis votre montre connectée (8) Vous bénéficiez d’un accès en 3G, 4G et en Wifi, quel que soit l’opérateur. Mentions légales (1) Pour les abonnés mobiles/tablettes SFR (option SFR TV à souscrire avec une offre mobile compatible) et pour les clients de l’offre box de SFR ou Fibre de SFR possédant un décodeur TV actif. Pour les clients box de SFR sans option TV, accès à plus de 60 chaînes en direct, mais TV à la demande non disponible. RDV dans votre espace client pour vérifier si votre offre est compatible. (2) Accès uniquement aux vidéos identifiées comme disponibles en multi-écrans et/ou au téléchargement. La visualisation d’un programme téléchargé hors ligne n’est possible que si le programme a été préalablement loué ou inclus dans un Pass auquel vous êtes abonné. La location / abonnement nécessite une connexion en 3G / 4G ou WIFI. Le nombre de programmes téléchargés est limité à la capacité de stockage de l’appareil. (3) Sous réserve d’avoir souscrit au bouquet TV premium sur la TV. (4) Sous réserve d'avoir un disque dur externe ou interne au décodeur TV ; non disponible avec la box TV Fibre de SFR. (5) Télécommande compatible seulement avec les décodeurs TV Evolution. (6) L’application SFR Manette téléchargeable sur le Google Play Store permet de jouer sur TV et/ou sur PC à une sélection de jeux préalablement achetés ou loués. (7) L’Extra Canalplay inclus dans les formules CARREES 4G ou en option payante. (8) Sous réserve d’avoir un décodeur TV SFR Evolution. Détails sur www.sfr.fr. description: Classic Motorcycles Finder-Craigslist Can also be downloaded here: http://bit.do/bjycZ ** Developed by enthusiast for enthusiasts ** ** Note: This app works based on the html from Craigslist. ** ** If it stops working, please upgrade to the latest release ** ** Please notify me via email when it stops working instead of writing bad review :-) ** ** Thanks for your support ** Uniquely designed to simplify searches when it comes to locating classic Motorcycles on Craigslist. Whether you are buying, selling or just browsing, this application can greatly enhance your search experience. Classic Motorcycles Finder features "Search by Era". This little functionality is a time saver. One checkbox is equivalent to 10 search criteria and if you are a Craigslist addict like me, you know how annoying searching on Craigslist can get. Most of the time, I don't have a particular year for a certain car that I'd look for on Craigslist. I basically browse until something that might interest me appear... Give it a try. If you have any question or suggestion, please email me at: bduong.android@gmail.com . Features include: - Search by era. - Results are displayed in tabs for each era. - Large, high resolution thumbnails for easy viewing - One-click email short cut. - Multi-cities search. - Cool vintage looking interface. - Easy to use. Thanks and enjoy! COPYRIGHT ©2013 All rights reserved.

description: Calendar Boom - Free Event Reminders is the most useful calendar application to manage your daily activities like reminders, meetings, calls, birthdays, anniversary, etc. with full graphics interface. ★ Features ★ - Get graphical calendar day, week & month views to display your events. - Get colourful reminders/notifications for your events. - Widget functionality, so you have upcoming events widget now your phone to view upcoming events instantly. - Share events via sms or email. - Share events on social networks like facebook & twitter. - Take backup of your events to restore transfer in pro version anytime. - Transfer your backup from one phone to another phone. No need to worry about loosing data. - Excellent search to find activities between any dates or with any keyword or type. - Get notification of your activities on alarm time which can be configured. - Copy or move your event quickly with single touch. - Single touch, long touch and double click on event to get different options in day/week views. Double click will show you quick notes, long touch will give you quick move on detail, edit or delete activity, single touch will move you on event detail screen. - Long Touch functionality on calendar to add your activity directly. - Enable/Disable all notifications from setting screen. - Enable/Disable allowing custom message while sharing events facebook/twitter from setting screen. - You can select custom ringtone for your reminder/notifications. - Set interval for Alarm duration from settings screen. Select -1 to play until you unlock the phone. - Put vibrate feature while playing alarm for event which can be configured from settings screen. - Add setting to set default appointment duration. - Add setting to set starting day of week whether it should be Sunday or Monday. - Add setting to set default appointment type. - Feedback feature to let us know about any bug/issue or your valuable suggestions to improve app. - 15 mins time span for all activities to manage it better way & for good visualization. - Supports portrait & landscape both modes. - Supports all phones & all tablets also with any screen resolution. ★ Download PRO version also for below more features ★ - Import all your data from all calendars like native calendar, Google calendar or any other which are configured in Android in Calendar Boom app. - Define custom event types for better management of events. - Avoid event notifications during running call which may disturb you. Activate this feature from settings screen. - Add 5 backups and restore any database from last 5 backups. - Restore your events from last 5 backups any-time if you lost data or change the phone. - Locate your event on map and get direction to reach at event location. - Set quiet hours to ignore event notifications on particular time interval like night or meeting time. You will all those events notifications after end of quite hours time. You will NOT loose any notification. - See your events in full Agenda view & quick agenda view along with month view. - To set working hours for appointments which will be displayed in different color in day view. - Get all texts in your language in PRO version. description: Der Abfahrtsmonitor bildet die Anzeigetafeln der Münchner S-Bahnhöfe wieder. Wer kennt es nicht, man kommt die Treppe runter und die S-Bahn fährt aus dem Bahnhof. Jetzt ist damit Schluss! Um festzustellen, ob sich das Laufen zur S-Bahn lohnt reicht ein kurzer Blick auf den Abfahrtsmonitor. Um auch S-Bahnen noch zu erwischen, die laut der Information der Bahn schon abgefahren sind, werden auch noch die beiden zuletzt abgefahrenen S-Bahnen angezeigt. Diese App richtet sich vor allem an Pendler, die täglich zwischen zwei Münchner S-Bahnhöfen pendeln müssen. Um es Pendlern leicher zu machen, die umsteigen müssen, sind die Widgets konfigurierbar. Jedem Widget können zwei Stationen zugewiesen werden, sodass verschiedene Stationen in verschiedenen Widgets angezeigt werden können. Durch eine frei konfigurierbare Schnellwahl-Liste können verschiedene Stationen sehr schnell angewählt werden. Manchmal ist es nötig einen Anschlusszug zu bekommen, dafür ist die ein sehr hilfreiches Feature! Es wird nur das S-Bahn Netz des MVV München unterstützt. Es werden keine U-Bahnen und auch keine Trams angezeigt. Für Verbesserungsvorschläge stehe ich offen, diese können an android@twocoders.de geschickt werden. Viel Spaß beim Verwenden! The departure board is the display panels of the Munich S-Bahn stations again. Who does not know, it comes down the stairs and the S-Bahn from the train station. Now that it's over! To determine whether running to the train reaches worth a quick look at the departure board. To catch and S-lifts or who are already left, according to the information of the track, even the two last worn suburban trains are shown. This app is primarily aimed at commuters who have to commute between two Munich S-Bahn stations daily. To make it leicher commuters who have to change, the widgets are configurable. Each widget can be assigned two stations so that different stations can be displayed in different widgets. Through a configurable speed dial list various stations can be selected very quickly. Sometimes it is necessary to get a connecting train, this is a very useful feature! It is only supported on the S-train network of the MVV Munich. There are no subways and trams also not displayed. I am open to suggestions for improvement, this can be sent to android@twocoders.de . Have fun using!
release_text: - schnellere Verarbeitung - komplett überarbeitet - Farbschema wählen - stadteinwärts / stadtauswärts statt Gleis wählbar - Station des Widgets direkt in der App von Widget aus aufrufbar - Holo Desgin

Turning a fan-favorite genre on its head, the hyper-addictive Mad Skills Motocross plays and feels like no other side-scrolling racing game. The unparalleled physics engine and unexpected power-ups give you a level of control that you have to play to believe. Launch off an enormous jump, land on your rear wheel, hit the throttle, and leave your opponent in a spray of dirt—then brag about it on Facebook and Twitter! Mad Skills Motocross is fun for novices but deep enough for nearly endless competitive high-level play. You’ll need to master wheelies, stoppies, nitro, rocket boots, backflips, front flips, and much more to truly be the best. Features: * Change the appearance of your bike and rider * Compete on 52 tracks, from easy to very technical * 30 more awesome tracks available as in-app purchases * Compete in Career or Time Attack modes * Compete in either Amateur or Pro modes for varying levels of difficulty * Use five different power-ups to find faster ways through tracks* Race “ghosts” of your own or your friends’ best times * Watch replays of your best races

Feedback - Share your experience with us.

description: Don't let the ants invade your phone. Catch them before it's too late. The game gets more intense as you go along, so you need to fight better to keep the pace. ★ ★ ★ FEATURES ★ ★ ★ ✓ challenging levels ✓ intuitive gameplay ✓ daily/monthly/all time highscores ★ ★ ★ TIPS ★ ★ ★ ✓ The first ant you catch starts the game and the level. ✓ Every ant you catch adds one point to the score. ✓ The first number in the topbar represents the score. ✓ The second number in the top-bar, after the slash, represents the score that must be achieved to finish the current level. ✓ At some point in the game catching an ant will give you an extra life. Take it fast,the offer won't last long ! ✓ To pause the game just enter the main menu. ★ Support and Feedback If you have any technical problems please email us directly at support@gsoftteam.com . Please, don’t leave support problems in our comments – we don’t check those regularly and it will take longer to fix any issues that you might encounter. Thank you for your understanding! Already a fan of the Ant Smasher? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news: https://www.facebook.com/gsoftteam https://twitter.com/gsoftteam

GPS-Tacho is a speedometer based on the values of your GPS sensors. It is displaying speed, precise GPS-time, coordinates, altitude, a compass with bearing and, if a data connection available, the current address. A special optional item for car drivers: the background color changes at common speed limits: 50 km/h, 70 km/h, 80 km/h, 100 km/h, 120 km/h. Unreliable speed values are now shaded in gray (eg. if the sensor is indicating a low speed, but no location change is detected). Selectable speed output formats: m/s, km/h, mph, kt Selectable distance and altitude formats: km, Nm, m, ft, yd Different degree out formats selectable. GPS-Tacho also provides trip statistics with maximal speed, duration, odometer, average total speed, moving time and average speed when moving, ascend and descend sum. Please respect, that altitude values from GPS have onlay one third accuracy compared ot horizontal coordinates! Your can also get high precision averaged GPS coordinates to reduce GPS error eg for placing geocaches. Averaging and trip statistics now run in a separate service, ensuring not to be terminated if app is running in background. You can save a location as GPX file on your sd-card. For raw positioning network based localization is supported (internet access necessary), but coordinate averaging and trip statistics require GPS. Please keep in mind, that the GPS sensors require high battery power. Although there are several power saving options in the settings, an expernal power supply is recommended for longer measurements. Bugs found? Please send an error report for error localisation and removal or an email instead of giving bad rating!
release_text: 1.5.1 Minor bugfixes 1.5.0 Trip statistics in service, App2SD enabled, Bugfixes

description: Приложение для гадания "Спрошу-ка у Пушкина!" даст возможность получить ответ на любой вопрос. Достаточно сформулировать вопрос и нажать кнопку. Это старинный способ гадания - гадание по книгам. Не нужно загадывать номер страницы и номер строки, а затем рыться в книге. Как правило, ответы ясны и понятны. Но иногда приходится приложить фантазию для расшифровки. Выборка строк для ответов ведется по книгам Пушкина - собранию стихов и роману "Евгений Онегин". Если вы чего-то не знаете, спросите у Пушкина=) Application for divination "I'll ask Single Pushkin!" will provide an opportunity to get an answer to any question. Enough to formulate a question and click. It is an ancient method of divination - divination by books. No need to guess the page number and line number, and then delve into the book. As a rule, the answers are clear and understandable. But sometimes you have to make fantasy for decryption. Fetching for answers is over books Pushkin - Meeting of poems and the novel "Eugene Onegin." If you do not know something, ask Pushkin =)

The Hidden Hearing app contains information about types and causes of hearing loss and tinnitus. The app has a soothing sounds feature which has been specially designed to help you relax. These sounds help reduce the perceived "loudness" of tinnitus making tinnitus symptoms less annoying and more manageable. The soothing sounds act as a masking remedy to treat tinnitus symptoms, such as annoying ear ringing to provide you with much needed relief from ear noise and ringing experienced as a symptom of tinnitus If you are worried about your hearing, know you have hearing loss, or are profoundly deaf the Hidden Hearing app will give you the practical information and advice you need. At Hidden Hearing we know hearing loss can be a big problem, but there is lots you can learn about how to treat it. Our app is a great place to start if you want information on any aspects of deafness, hearing loss or tinnitus, or about the work we at Hidden Hearing do. Hidden Hearing is Ireland’s premier professional provider of hearing healthcare in the private sector with a national network of over sixty five branches and clinics.

description: OsmAnd Parking Plugin is a reminder for your parking position. This is an additive plugin to the navigation app OsmAnd. The plugin offers two functions: - time independent reminder (only a marker on the map). - time limited reminder with alarm upon time expiration (includes also a marker on the map). To place a Parking reminder on the map: 1.Tap and hold on the map until a text bubble pops up. 2.Tap on the text bubble and choose Parking reminder from the menu. 3.Set the type of reminder you wish. Activating/Deactivating OsmAnd Parking Plugin,can be done in Osmand>Settings>Plugin Manager.

Save hundreds of dollars a year!* The app voted the best gas price app on the iPhone and iPod is now available for Android! Fuel Finder is the most comprehensive source of gas prices in the US and Canada because it is compiled from price reports submitted by millions of users, just like you. And the Fuel Finder app is the most feature-rich fuel finder available for the Android. Compare for yourself. Gas prices change frequently and may vary as much as 20% within only a few blocks. It's important to be able to find the service station with the lowest priced fuel. Features: - Suggestions based on distance and price - Set preferences to refine searches - Complete gas station information including extra services like car wash, ATM, and more - Maps and directions available based on GPS location * These are actual figures from 5/23/2012: a car that has an 18 gallon tank that gets 19 MPG in the city and drives 15,000 miles per year in Dallas, TX will save up to $4.86/tank and $213.16/year by using the Fuel Finder app. Keywords: fuel, gas, save, auto, car, mpg, fumes, savings, bottle, rocket, find, finder

app_name: ピグアバターでまったり農園ゲーム 「ファーミー」
description: このゲームはアメーバピグで農園生活を送るシュミレーションゲームだよ！！ お友達のピグと協力して、畑で作物を育てたり、 かわいい動物を 飼ったり、農場や牧場を可愛くデコしたりして楽しめるゲーム！ ーーーーーーーーーーーー ■遊び方はとっても簡単！■ ーーーーーーーーーーーー 畑を耕して色々な野菜や果物の種をまき、肥料をあげたり、水やりをして育てよう。 たくさん作物を育ててスキルアップしていくと、品質の高い作物が育てられるようになるよ！ 育成が得意なお友達に手伝ってもらえば、いっぱい高品質な作物を収穫できるから協力してもらってね！ 野菜や果物、お花など色んな種類があるから、自分だけのオリジナルなお庭をつくってね。 ーーーーーーーーーーーー ▼牧場もあるよ！▼ ーーーーーーーーーーーー また、牧場の動物たちには名前をつけて、大事に飼育してね。 たまーーーに、アイテムを拾ってきてくれることがあるよ！ お友達の動物たちと遊ぶこともできるから、牧場に行ってみよう！ ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー ▼期間限定イベントも開催中！！▼ ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー さらに、様々なデコがもらえる期間限定イベントも開催中だよ。 動物とおでかけしたり、巨大作物「デカベジ」をみんなと協力して収穫したり、 楽しいイベント盛りだくさん！！季節の野菜やお花も登場するからチェックしよう！ イベントでデコが手に入ったら、農園をあなた好みに着せ替えてみよう！ ファーミーはのんびり暇つぶしに収穫したり、動物と遊んだり、 仲間の農園にお手伝いに行ったり、あなた次第で色んな遊び方ができる育成ゲームだよ！ あなたのピグですぐにはじめられるから、ぜひ農園ライフを楽しんでみてね♪ 今すぐマイファームをのぞいてみよう。

Scene: San Francisco. Situation: The city has been taken over by masses of vicious zombies. Your Mission: Kill all invading zombies with only the help of your guns and an axe. Zombie Slasher is a first-person shooter where the player uses various weapons to kill approaching zombies. Tap on the weapon you want to use and then tap on the zombies multiple times to kill them. As the level increases, the number of zombies, their speed, and the usable weapons increase as well. Slash your way to a high score and save the world from the zombies. San Francisco is counting on you to protect what’s left; Fate has chosen you to be the Zombie Slasher!

"Become Rich" is a quiz game in English and Greek from the creators of Eureka and "Educational Hangman". The only 100% free Quiz game for ever in the Google Play Store! No hidded fees, just download it and play! If you like quiz games, you are going to love it! This is a game that will test your trivial knowledge. Answer 16 questions correctly in this fun and educational quiz, win a million and become a new millionaire! If you find it too difficult to become a millionaire, feel free to use the three aids. Includes: ✓ Over 1000 multiple choice questions in English ✓ Highscores ✓ Online Score ✓ Beautiful graphics ✓ Very small size, just 1,7Mb ✓ Supports all mobile and tablet PCs with android operating system. ✓ The chance to become a millionaire (well in theory). The questions of the game are chosen from 16 categories of questions: • History • Geography • Music • Space • Sports • World Mythology • Science • Arts • Techology • Animals • Politics • Language Every player can add questions by simply submitting them via an ingame submitter. After being reviewed they are going to be added to the database. Please send us any comments you have. Please help us make this app, the best free (for ever) quiz in the world! Thank you! Have fun and improve your knowledge!

The animated petting zoo for children aged 2+ They're back! The popular pets from PumiLumi hide-and-seek are now live and kicking! Meet the 15 cute interactive animals in the PumiLumi touch zoo. You can bring them to life! Select, drag and wipe parts of their bodies to tickle and feed the animals, watch them jump and fly, tease them and make them laugh. The animals respond to each touch with the right hilarious movement and noise. Pull the elephant's trunk, tickle the monkey's tummy, feed the hen seeds, pull the zebra's tail; watch the owl flap its wings, the kangaroo jump and the bear dance - and much more! Great fun! This app is perfect for young children with its simple design and absolutely intuitive operation. It contains no text and no advertising. The game helps develop children's observational and concentration skills. Meet the animals: - a dancing polar bear - a silly monkey - a crocodile that snores - a kangaroo with its baby in its pouch - a grumpy zebra - a leopard that loses its spots - a clumsy elephant - a pig in its mud hole - an owl with electric ears - a lively squirrel - a cute bunny rabbit with a carrot - a crazy hen - a tortoise laying eggs - a many-armed octopus - a snake that swallows a ball The appealing illustrations and great animations in this app were developed by Elevision. We have a range of other popular educational children's apps in our AppStore.

description: SPECIAL PRICE 56% OFF (USD 8.99 -> USD 3.99)!!! Demons attack humans, and humans live in fear of them... Set off on a journey with a young woman known as 'the savior', to Raglis, far away in the west! The story features a group of characters who on the surface have nothing in common, heading to Raglis, far away in the west. The group is made up of demons, humans, and half-demons, all with their own objectives, and in the group is a young woman known as 'the savior', whose a mysterious power has awoken... A World Populated by Demons and Humans In a world where demons attack humans, the humans live in daily fear of them. Raglis, an organization working to help those humans, is preparing to welcome Sania, a young woman with the power to destroy those demons. Sania is known as 'the savior'. At one point, when Sania's life is in danger from the demons, a young half-demon called Shin suddenly appears, and his help allows Sania to escape. Shin and Sania, and an odd group of characters who on the surface have nothing in common, set out towards Raglis, far away in the west.. Tactical Battles: Moving and Battle Arts During battles, both enemies and allies can move around their own battle territory. This tactic is known as 'moving'. Also, items known as Battle Arts (BTA) can be placed in allied or in enemy territory, and have a wide range of effects. Enjoy technical and strategic battles by making use of both 'moving' and Battle Arts. Soul Arms and Orbs Each character has a weapon called a Soul Arm. Soul Arms can grow and develop by using Soul Points, which are gained after battles. Also, by equipping a Soul Arm with an Orb, you become able to use an Occult Art corresponding to that Orb. Develop and strengthen your weapons to best fit your characters! Chances to get rare items, once every 30 minutes! By using the Hourglass of Fortune, you can bring about bonus encounters, which are a chance to gain rare items, including Atoma Slips. You can use the Hourglass of Fortune once every 30 minutes, so by checking the app frequently, you might find yourself able to progress through the adventure more smoothly... By using Atoma Slips, you can purchase Soul Points and special equipment, etc. You can gain Atoma Slips from bonus encounters and while playing the game normally, but optionally, you can also buy extra Atoma Slips through an in-app purchase. *This game features some in-app-purchase content. While in-app-purchase content requires additional fees, by no means it is necessary for finishing the game. *The actual price might differ depending on the region. description: Android Terminal Emulator, BusyBox, Frotz, Perl and SSH via Dropbear (dropbear just added, so need to do more testing with it) without rooting your device. Tiny Utils combines tiny versions of many common and useful GNU/UNIX utilities and terminal into a single small Android application. It provides replacements for most of the utilities you usually find in GNU fileutils, shellutils, and more. Tiny Utils installs BusyBox, microperl (a small perl interpreter), patchelf, frotz (so you can play Z code interactive fiction games) and dropbear an SSH client and server. Tiny Utils also includes the Android Terminal Emulator within it, so you have a nice, proven work environment where you can use all this capability. Tiny Utils is not all business though as it now has frotz which allows you to play z-code games. See the screen shots of examples of downloading and playing a couple of popular games (Zork and Spider and Web). Given how nice the Android Terminal Emulator is, I think this might be the best environment for playing z code games. All combined, this give you many of the commands you are used to having while working at a GNU/Linux Terminal. Find the full list of BusyBox commands here: http://www.busybox.net/downloads/BusyBox.html Also, Tiny Utils does not require you to have a rooted device to install it. Being such, it does not modify your Android system at all and can be uninstalled in a normal fashion. While some commands, like chroot, or su, require you to have root permissions, the most commonly used commands do not. Known limitations: Some commands, require rooting your device to work properly. Some commands will not work as expected because Android is not GNU/Linux (tell me what you need/want if it is not working, so I can prioritize). All that said, your device will get a LOT more useful and powerful with this installed. Source code is posted and I will be posting many examples (over time) of awesome ways you can use this here: https://github.com/corbinlc/tinyutils Please provide feedback. Rate it and tell others if you think it is good. If you run into any problems please file an issue here https://github.com/corbinlc/tinyutils/issues so I can get any details I need and so you can track progress on the issue. Also, if you have any suggestions/contributions that you think will improve this further, don't be shy. While I am charging for this, I am doing so minimally to make sure this continues to be supported and improved going forward and I am pretty sure this will be worth more to you than what is being charged.
release_text: Fourth release: uninstall and reinstall if you have any issue launching. added frotz, so you can play z-code games (see screen shots). Use android ping instead of busybox ping. ping, wget, nslookup, telnet, etc all support names and not just ip addresses. Rate it if you think it is good. If you run into any problems please file an issue here https://github.com/corbinlc/tinyutils/issues so I can get any details I need and so you can track progress on the issue.
