description: "ECG practical" is an application designed to help you acquire the basic knowledge of electrocardiography; Knowledge that all healthcare professionals should possess, especially those who work in intensive care units such as CCU, ICU, Operating Rooms, etc.. Electrocardiography is definitely not an "easy" subject of study but with a minimum effort you can acquire the basic informations to be able to detect a critical situation and alert the cardiologist. The electrocardiogram is a simple test, fast, painless, very low-cost, and can definitely save the life of a person. In Italy every year about 120,000 people are affected by myocardial infarction, of these, approximately 25 000 die before reaching the hospital. The diagnosis of myocardial infarction is mainly made with the execution of the ECG. With "ECG practical" you can learn in a simple way the basic principles of electrocardiography, you can calculate your heart rate from the milliseconds or the number of squares between two RR, you can see several examples of ECG tracings, calculate the corrected QT interval, you can easily find the QRS axes or you can make your "diagnosis" simply by answering a few simple questions. Note: The app does not process the photos taken with the camera or loaded from the gallery to not affect their quality. Loading large images (> 4 mpx) can cause the application to crash, especially in phones with little memory. When taking a photo, choose a lower than 4-megapixel resolution, and shot from a close distance. Version "Demo" The "Demo" version has the same functionality as the normal one, the only limit is the number of openings (15) of the application. I did not want to put the usual time limit (number of days) because it happened to me to install an app to try it for a certain period of time, but due to work and family commitments I could not try them sufficiently before deadline. Before you buy the full version, please try the "demo" version of the product. If you remain satisfied after trying it, buy the full version (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ecg.practical&hl=it) and support the further development of the application. ATTENTION! This software absolutely MUST NOT be used to place any medical or nursing diagnosis, but should only be used for educational purposes. Bug reports, comments and suggestions are very welcome: kapelis95@gmail.com

Anoc is a secure Octave Editor (Matlab clone) for your Android Device. It allows you to create and manage Octave projects directly on your Android device and generate the result and plots by using Verbosus (Online LaTeX and Octave Editor) "Octave is [...] intended for numerical computations. It provides capabilities for the numerical solution of linear and nonlinear problems, and for performing other numerical experiments. It also provides extensive graphics capabilities for data visualization and manipulation" This software is provided "as is" without warranties or conditions of any kind, either expressed or implied. Features: * Use a dedicated server that runs a full Octave installation to perform expensive mathematical calculations * 2 Modes: Local Mode (stores .m files on your device) and Cloud Mode (synchronizes your projects with the cloud) * Generate and view the result and plots from your Octave code * Syntax highlighting (comments, operators, plot functions) * Hotkeys (see below) * Web-Interface (Cloud Mode) * Dropbox integration (Local Mode: Menu -> Options -> Link to Dropbox) * Box integration (Local Mode: Menu -> Options -> Link to Box) * Autosave (Local Mode) * Unlimited number of projects and documents (Local Mode) * Encrypted transmission to the server by using HTTPS Limitations: * Max. number of projects and documents: 4 (Cloud Mode) Add existing .m files / import existing projects in Local Mode: * Link to Dropbox or Box (Options -> Link to Dropbox / Link to Box) and let Anoc automatically synchronize your projects OR * Put all your files in the Anoc folder on your SD card: /sdcard/Anoc/Local/[project]/ Please note: There must exist at least one .m file. The name of the project is the [project] folder name. Use function files: Create a new file e.g. worker.m and fill it with function s = worker(x) % worker(x) Calculates sine(x) in degrees s = sin(x*pi/180); In your main .m file you can call it with worker(2) Hotkeys in editor: ctrl+s: save ctrl+g: generate PDF ctrl+n: new document ctrl+d: delete document ctrl+.: next document
release_text: * Bugfix (Cloud Mode): Right after registering the plots are now displayed correctly

The battle of Gettysburg was fought over 3 days from July 1st-3rd 1863. It is considered the turning point of the American civil war, showing that the Confederates were not invincible, halting the invasion of the North, and providing the political popularity for Lincoln to be re-elected as president. This wargame allows you to play either side against the computer, or hotseat against another player. There is a map of the Gettysburg battlefield divided into hexagons, each representing about 500 yards across. The combat units are brigades, with each figure representing 100 men or 10 guns. Victory is achieved by the capture of flagged areas on the map (the flag indicates ownership) and also inflicting more losses. The game can be played with fog of war on or off, and options can be set for when the tardy Confederate cavalry commander, General Stuart, shows up (although this will also affect his Union cavalry counterparts). Game copyright Dave Kershaw, DK Simulations Ltd 2012. Artwork by Gonzalo Santacruz

LT: Programa nemokama ir prieinama visiems išmaniųjų telefonų naudotojams. Programos naudojimui būtinas 3G interneto ryšys. Naudojantis Programa, galima įsigyti įvairių rūšių Vilniaus miesto viešojo transporto bilietų mobiliuoju telefonu, arba planšetiniu kompiuteriu. Vilniaus miesto viešojo transporto bilietų rūšis ir kainas tvirtina Vilniaus miesto savivaldybės Taryba. Programa leidžia vartotojui pasirinkti norimą bilieto rūšį ir kiekį. Naudodamasis Programa vartotojas atsako už tinkamą bilieto rūšies, kiekio, nuolaidos tipo parinkimą, bei kitus įvedamus ir pasirenkamus duomenis. Apmokėti už viešojo transporto bilietus galima sekant nurodymus išmaniojo telefono ekrane. Kelionės viešuoju transportu metu bent vienas viešojo transporto bilietas privalo būti aktyvintas. Turimus bilietus visada galima peržiūrėti skiltyje „Mano bilietai". Viešojo transporto kontrolės metu, kontrolieriui paprašius, vartotojas turi paruošti aktyvintą bilietą kontrolei specialaus mygtuko „Paruošti kontrolei" pagalba. Ekrane pasirodžius specialiam kontrolės kodui vartotojas turi parodyti jį kontrolieriui, kad šis specialaus įrenginio pagalba nuskaitytų kontrolės kodą ir patikrintų aktyvinto bilieto galiojimą. Programa taip pat leidžia planuoti savo kelionės maršrutą viešuoju transportu bei peržiūrėti viešojo transporto tvarkaraščius. EN: The Application is free of charge and accessible to all users. 3G connection is required to use the Application. The Application allows the user to purchase different types of Vilnius public transport tickets. Vilnius public transport ticket types and fares are approved by the Vilnius City Municipality Council. The user is able to select the required ticket type and quantity by using this Application. When using the Application, the user is responsible for selecting the appropriate ticket type, quantity and discount that the user is eligible for, as well as entering other input and optional data correctly. Please follow the instructions provided in the Application in order to make a payment for the public transport tickets. At least one ticket must be activated during the trip. All the purchased tickets can be reviewed under “My tickets” tab in the Application. During the ticket inspection, the user must provide the activated ticket for the inspector by selecting the option “Prepare for inspection” in the Application. As soon as the special inspection code appears on the device screen, the user must provide it to the inspector. By using the special inspection device, the inspector checks the validation of the ticket provided by the user. The Application also allows to plan the trip by the public transport and view the public transport schedules. LT: The program is free and available to all smartphone users. Applications require the use of a 3G internet connection. Using the program, you can purchase different kinds of Vilnius public transport tickets, mobile phone, or tablet. Vilnius public transport ticket types and prices are approved by the Vilnius City Municipality Council. The program allows the user to choose the type and amount of the ticket. Using the program the user is responsible for the appropriate ticket type, amount, type of selection of discounts, and other input and optional data. Pay for public transport tickets are available by following the instructions on the screen of your smartphone. Travelling on public transport, at least one public transport ticket must be activated. The available tickets are always available for viewing under "My Tickets." Public transport controls, the controller's request, the user must prepare the activated ticket special control button "Prepare the control support. Appear on the screen for specific user control code to show him the controller that this special unit help control code scanned to verify the validity of the ticket activated. The program also allows you to plan your travel route on public transport and to view the schedules of public transport. Sand Draw is a fun app which lets you draw on realistic sand! After a couple of minutes playing with sand draw it will be hard for you to stop drawing, since the result you get looks so real, and easily achieved. Want to draw a new sand draw? Just shake the device, and let the waves wipe out the sand. Sea View! Click on the 'sea' button and get a beautiful view of the sea with a romantic sunset, while changing the angle by tilting your phone! You can even control the sunset by dragging the sun or the moon, and place an object in the sea such as a deserted island, a lighthouse, a ship, an exotic limestone and more! - Make your drawing look even more realistic by adding authentic beach objects such as sea-shells, weeds, rocks and foot/hand prints and different brushes to choose from. - Control the color of the sea, the sky and the sand which was drawn by you. - Change to a different sand textures and sketch on them! - Change the size of your brushes. - Make your drawing look even more realistic by adding authentic beach objects such as sea-shells, weeds, rocks and foot/hand prints. sand draw can be used to send a romantic greeting to your loved one, play Tic-Tac-Toe and other games, or just draw whatever comes up on your mind! sand draw is suitable for children and adults as one to create amazing artwork by simple sketching! Get it now, and start your sand drawing and express your art :)
release_text: - Dozens of new beach objects! - Lava sand!

description: If you are looking for great holiday bread recipes, this is the app for you. Pull A-parts, Lefse, Stollen and more! Fruit breads, nut breads, and even The best rolls ever! This user friendly Bread making recipe app will have them salivating for more. Bread Recipe App Features: * Free * User friendly * Recipe Search * Great photos * Expertly created * Professionally designed * Amazing Christmas recipes * Many creative baking ideas Whether this is your first bread baking experience or you are making your first rolls, this Bread Baking Recipe app will make you a bread making pro, and fast. These recipes are favored by many as the best holiday bread recipes on the internet. Download today and gain access to many holiday bread recipes. Many amazing bread recipes. From the Best Ever Cinnamon Pull Aprats, Blueberry Zucchini Bread, Banana Nut Bread, Babovka Poppy Seed Rings, these recipes have a mcuh to offer for all of your Holiday tastes. Don't let holiday go by without serving up all of the old favorites or new ones in your oven. Make some muffins or some fruit Bread for holiday festivities. Get the best Christmas Bread making Recipes on the net! You will love these bread recipes!

★귀여운 동물들과 즐기는 쉽고 재밌는 버블 슈팅, 타이니팡2!★ 타이니팡2, 스토리 모드가 추가되어 더욱 새롭고 강력해졌어요! 귀여운 울보 양 ‘벤’과 똑똑한 모험가 햄스터 ‘햄비’가 방울에 갇힌 동물 친구들을 구하러 ‘타이니팡2’에 등장했어요. 더욱 신나고 아찔하게 돌아온 버블슈팅의 최강자, 타이니팡2를 만나보세요! ★새롭고 다양한 스테이지가 가득, ‘스토리’ 모드!★ 1. 재미있고 다양한 스테이지 구성과 다채로운 에피소드 동물 구하기 미션부터 마법 항아리에 방울 떨어뜨리기까지~ 스테이지마다 재미있는 미션이 가득해요. 차근차근 생각해 보고 방울 하나하나 최선을 다해보세요. 벤과 햄비의 끝없는 모험을 위해 스테이지는 계속 추가될 예정이에요! 2. 국내 버블슈팅 게임 최초, 메시지 기능 구현! 친구야~ 거기까지 어떻게 갔니? 궁금하면 지도에서 멀리간 친구 사진을 클릭해서 물어보세요. 물론 모험할 때 밥이 되는 도토리를 친구에게 요청할 때 써도 좋겠죠! 3. 벤과 햄비의 모험을 도와주는 다양한 아이템 반사각, 폭탄, 5회 더 던지기 등 아이템을 전략적으로 사용해서 친구보다 빨리 새로운 스테이지를 만나보세요. ★신나고 아찔한 버블슈팅의 쾌감, ‘오리지널’ 모드!★ 1. 총 3가지의 다양한 게임 방식 도전!60 – 60초 안에 많은 통통 튀는 방울을 터트려 주세요. 화면 내 배수방울을 공략하면, 높은 점수를 획득할 수 있어요. 릴레이팡 - 시간은 짹깍짹깍 심장은 쫄깃쫄깃, 어서 시간방울을 공략해서 최대한 많은 점수를 내 보자구요. 아케이드 – 앗! 동물방울들이 점점 하늘에서 빨리 내려와요. 땅에 닿기 전에 어서 팡팡 터뜨려주세요. 2. 동물 친구들과 함께 던져보세요! '하하하, 더 이상 혼자가 아니에요!' 새침하고 통통하지만 때론 주변을 놀라게 하는 펭귄 친구, 듬직하고 순하지만 가끔 무섭게 화가 나는 곰 친구, 그 외에 작고 귀여운 펫 친구들까지! 동물 친구들은 동물 뽑기를 통해 만나볼 수 있어요! 3. 우정점수를 모으면, 공짜로 아이템이 쏟아진다! 친구에게 격려의 하트도 보내고, 잠깐 자는 양이 있다면 좀 깨워주세요. 물론, 친구초대도 된답니다. 100점을 모으면, 공짜로 풍성한 아이템이 짜자잔! 이번 주도 일등에 도전해 보세요. 4. 다양하고 강력한 아이템! 각 모드 별로 구성된 총 20종의 다양한 아이템을 써보세요. 물론, 아이템 파워업을 통해 더욱 강력한 아이템으로 바꿀 수 있어요. ☆★☆ 일부 단말에서 원활한 게임 플레이가 어려울 수 있습니다.(갤럭시 지오/옵티머스 원/갤럭시 네오/갤럭시 A) ☆★☆ * 본 게임은 부분유료 아이템 구매가 가능합니다. 부분유료 아이템 구매시 추가 비용이 발생할 수 있으며, 부분유료 아이템은 종류에 따라 청약철회가 가능 또는 제한될 수도 있습니다. * 본 게임의 이용과 관련된 조건(계약해지/청약철회 등)은 게임 내 또는 컴투스 모바일 게임 서비스 이용약관(홈페이지에서 확인 가능, http://terms.withhive.com/terms/mobile/policy.html)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다. * 본 게임과 관련된 문의/상담은 게임 소개 페이지 하단의 '개발자에게 직접 문의하기', 카카오톡 아이디 : Com2uSGames, E-mail : Support@com2us.com , 컴투스 홈페이지 로그인 후 '1:1 문의하기'를 통해 하실 수 있습니다. ★ cute animals and enjoy easy and fun bubble shooter, Tiny Fang 2! ★ Tiny Fang 2, Story Mode has been added that was to further new and powerful! This live wallpaper is a programmer´s attempt to support Greenpeace´s efforts to save the arctic... The Arctic is under threat. As you read this, oil companies and politicians are plotting to carve up the icy north, extending their national territories and searching for drill sites. But with your help, we can draw a line in the ice and put the Arctic out of the polluters' reach – forever. This free initial version only show one of the species in danger: the polar bear. From preferences, you can access to the official page to sign in yourself and support this remarkable initiative. Enjoy!

Founded for those passionate about cruising, this app is a good source for the latest news about Royal Caribbean with cruise ship videos, pictures, deals and more. Features: • Featured Royal Caribbean cruise news, deals and stories. • Search or browse the latest news for Royal Caribbean. • Coverage of breaking news about Royal Caribbean cruises as it happens • Post cruise news to your Twitter and Facebook account • Email, Bluetooth and SMS articles to your friends • Leave comments with socialize • One click access to official tweets by Royal Caribbean, Facebook messages and videos from the official Royal Caribbean YouTube channel, all from within the app. Take the latest news about Royal Caribbean International with you!

description: OFFLINE EMERGENCY TOOL build up on 100 of thousands real life processed emergency situations over the past two years. A unique search that is build for you, for every person. Please take some time to explore the app before emergency happen. Comprehensive Medical Health Guide & symptom checker. 24/7 access to health information and decision-support tools. A Wi-Fi only version of 'AR First Aid -Emergency Home & Outdoor' app. If you have a phone enabled device please use phone version. A scaled down, a Wi-Fi device (Tablet) enabled version of our ad-free comprehensive Medical Health Care guide. If you use a Phone-enabled device please use our main app AR First Aid Emergency and Home. AR Based on our custom platform, we provide a real solutions to life situations by professional ER MD team. Another features we brought first in mobile - automated treatment machine & search predictions in addition to simplify quick links, Natural search, based on comprehensive local conditions, medical history, signs & symptoms evaluating engine, that excludes 'self diagnose' and rare deceases. Ranking emphasis on Medical First Aid and life threatening conditions. Outdoors, home and car topics. Internet connectivity is not required, after init sync. Our content is original, 100% written and edited by MDs. We are not compromising with the quality of our articles. +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ AR Features: ~ quick links ~ Content is available off-line, no connectivity required after the initial sync ~ Natural search ~ Voice Search (just works :-) ) ~ Human Atlas + Search. ~ Symptom and sign checker and analyzer! ~ Lab values and tests. ~ Articles are written for the purpose of this application and to help in mobile non-hospital conditions. ~ Emergency medical conditions ranking. Using a proprietary symptom medical chart to rank. AI auto - improvements based on the current usage data, symptoms, signs and vitals. ~ Emergency, life threatening and every day conditions. Most home medical remedies are already covered. We are adding, improving and tweaking our existing articles based on the current usage data. Daily. Our app does not try to diff diagnose, we are not replacing Medical Doctor opinion. ~ Local medical service providers, on your finger tips :-) ~ Medical Profile, used to rank and filter search results ~ Articles specifically written for the application to fit our mission. ~ We constantly expand our database with more and more medical data. Wide variety of answers for new non-emergency conditions/cases are added every day. +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ It is a free, non-profit app. cant be moved on SD due to copyright protection. Our mission: I was an ER MD for the last 15 years and I always got frustrated with a cases where I could have helped my patients, if only the condition was identify or I was contacted in time. Our Emergency Respond application is aimed to help untrained users to recognize and react to a medical situation. It is sometimes crucial to identify the most probable cause, depending on patient condition and medical history. We incorporate a separate time/location factors in order to rank the result set. AR First Aid features a comprehensive search engine which evaluates the search inquiry for known combinations of symptoms, signs, and conditions. Our basic IA ranks possible causes and identifies potentially dangerous situations given the patient medical history. AR First AID shows a specific steps to perform for most common home/outdoor/sport conditions and injuries in plain language. Supported media includes videos, images and step by step instructions. In certain cases, when we need to further differentiate, additional options will be presented. Last but not least, we try to find a medical professional or service near by. We are NOT affiliated to or profit from such services or publications
release_text: 1.9.0 AR Medical Home Guide WiFi Lite * GUI fixes * GPS fix * Database improvements Please use the email to contact us with suggestions and improvements. Please use the email to contact us with suggestions and improvements.

description: ! Attetntion: If the game crashes as soon as you try to play, please go to the options menu and press the update the questions button (you need internet for it to work). ! Test your knowledge of Martin's world with this unofficial "Game of Thrones" quiz app of over 400 questions about the books and movies of "Game of Thrones" and "A song of Ice and Fire". This app is for all fans of "Game of Thrones" and its awesome world! Can you manage to answer all the questions? Answer more than 400 questions on 12 different levels of difficulty. Questions include all topics from both the books "A song of Ice and Fire" and the show "Game of Thrones". If you ever need assistance, you can rely on the three jokers. Collect achievements during the game and play for one of four major houses. Answer the questions correctly and rise in your power and in your level. Test your skills in Challenge mode and play against time or for lives. Compare your high scores with the world and tell your friends. Features: - Over 400 questions about A song of Ice and Fire and Game of Thrones - Advance levels and make your way from a simple peasant up to the glorious captain on different houses - Earn Achievements - Play in the Challenge mode and reach the high score - Cloudsave - Suggest questions and see them implemented in the quiz If you want to help the development of the app please rate the app, give feedback and join our beta test group at: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/102588539040686608767 Have fun!

If you like pixelized 3D graphics, or you're a fan of graphic similar to Minecraft, you have to check this wallpaper. If you bored with static wallpapers - then test Voxel Craft Live Wallpaper - this is a dynamic wallpaper that turns ordinary images into 3D objects. Design your own wallpaper - Voxel Craft gives you ability to edit the displayed objects. Voxel Craft is supplied with few ready to use images of objects, but you can always go into edit mode and change any existing image. With a simple interface, you can draw your own object which will be converted into a 3D wallpaper. You can also export or import your drawings, so your work will not be lost when you change the displayed object. Voxel Craft operates on low-resolution drawings, so when you try to import a bigger picture it will be resized. Wallpaper offers: - 9 ready to display graphic objects - interactivity (by sliding your finger across the screen, you can change the movement of object) - possibility of edition, create your own wallpaper (you can change the default appearance of the object by editing the picture at a resolution of 16x16 or 8x8 pixels) - ability to import other graphics - ability to export graphics for later use This app will add a sponsored caller id service to your device. This will add a few permission requests to provide the service. By using it we get a few cents and it will help us a lot to keep developing more apps. If you don’t, you can delete the app or disable the feature in the app settings and no harm is done. Thank you.

PlayerPro DSPPack is a free digital sound processing plugin for PlayerPro. PlayerPro is an advanced music and video player for Android 2.x devices. PlayerPro DSPPack provides an incomparable sound experience thanks to a high performance, high quality 10 band graphic equalizer, alongside booming bass and virtualizer effects and many audio customization options: gapless playback, cross fade, replay gain, left-right channel balance, audio limiting etc. PlayerPro DSPack supports a range of more than 30 different audio formats, from the very popular to the very specialized. In addition, it contains highly optimized ARM-NEON routines that dramatically reduce battery consumption, making it the most battery friendly DSP plugin of the Android market. !!!! PlayerPro DSPPack v4.0 requires PlayerPro Music Player v2.8 or later !!!! INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS: * From PlayerPro app, go to Settings > Audio and check the "Activate DSP pack" option. * Restart PlayerPro app for the changes to take effect (PlayerPro will ask you to do so). * You can now access the audio effects screen via the options menu or from the player screen (EQ button). * Use the audio settings menu to customize playback: adjust manual and auto crossfade time, activate gapless or replay gain, adjust left-right volume balance etc. * In case you experience playback skipping, please increase the audio buffer: go to Settings / Audio and change the "Audio buffer" value. Larger buffers should reduce skipping. DSP PACK FEATURES: * Supports playback of all common audio formats, directly from PlayerPro music player: mp3, mp4, m4a, aac, wma, ogg, wav, flac. * Supports playback of some less popular audio formats, using an external file browser app like ES File Explorer or ASTRO File Manager: wavpack, aif, au, paf, iff, svx, sf, voc, w64, mat4, mat5, pvf, xi, htk, caf, sd2, sds, txw, gsm, nist, rx2, opus. * 10 band graphic equalizer with 15 default presets. * Ability to edit existing presets or create new ones. * Preamp control. * Audio limiter. * Bass boost control. * Virtualizer control. * Volume balance control. * Gapless playback. * Auto and manual crossfade. * Replay gain. * Supports any audio sample rate thanks to downsampling. * Runs on all ARM processors. Contains highly optimized ARM-NEON routines that dramatically reduce battery consumption.
release_text: 14/12: v4.4 - Bug fixes 18/11: v4.3 - Support for android 4.4 - Bug fixes 01/11 : v4.2 - Patch update 26/10: v4.0 - Gapless playback support for aac/mp4 - Replay gain support for mp3, flac, ogg, and aac/mp4 - Fixed equalizer high-pitched sound bug - Audio limiter - Support for sampling rates > 48kHz - Added Virtualizer effect - Ability to select between PlayerPro and native effects (Audio settings > Effects) - Support for new file types (aif, au, paf, iff, svx, etc) - Left-right volume balance

This free offline Spanish dictionary explains the meaning of Spanish words. Definitions are based on Spanish Wiktionary. This is a monolingual dictionary only in Spanish, i.e. words must be entered in spanish. Features: ♦ More than 56000 spanish definitions and large number of inflected forms ♦ Fast as it works offline, internet is used only when a word is not found in the offline dictionary ♦ You can leaf through words using your finger! ♦ Easy and functional user interface, optimized also for tablets ♦ Bookmarks and history with option to backup your bookmarks ♦ Crossword help: the symbol ? can be used in place of unknown letter ♦ Random search (shuffle): useful to learn new words ♦ Compatible with Moon+ Reader and FBReader ♦ Themes with user defined text colors You can listen to the word pronunciation, provided that voice data have been installed in your phone (Text-to-speech engine). An offline dictionary needs memory. In case your device has low memory, please consider to use the online dictionary: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=livio.dictionary Question & Answers: http://goo.gl/UnU7V Information about permissions used by the application can be found here: http://goo.gl/AsqT4C Information for application developers: ✔ This application provides Dictionary API for 3rd party developers, please read further details: http://thesaurus.altervista.org/dictionary-android This application requires the following permissions: INTERNET - to retrieve the definition of missing words WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (aka Photos/Media/Files) - to backup configuration and bookmarks

description: "Shall we date?: Magic Sword" is the first ever western fantasy created by shall we date series based on the legendary King Arthur. Let the Magic Sword transport you as a princess and your knights back in the Arthurian time and start your adventure romance. ===Main features=== - Play basic story for FREE: A new fantasy story based on the legendary King Arthur - Choose your favorite character: Handsome knights who will capture your heart! You can choose among the three men to begin your romance. - Multiple-endings: The choices you make will determine how each story ends. - Beautiful still graphics: Check out the beautiful artwork by the Japanese illustrator. - Decorate your own avatar: Decorate your own avatar and show your creativity! - The basic story plot is the same as the paid version "Shall we date?: Magic Sword". === Story === This story is all about, you were assigned to look after the Excalibur sword, the sword has been around for decades, passed down from generations to generations until it was stolen...by the legendary King Arthur with his mysterious behavior. You vow to get it back. Now you (player) also a fighter and three brave knights set out on a journey to get the sword back. It's a journey full of thrilling adventure, battles, humorous and not to forget romances. Experience the stunning beautiful story and the handsome knights like never before. Find out how this journey changes you. === How to buy coins === Once the tutorial is cleared, you will see a Menu button at the bottom of the page, Tap Menu > then tap Buy Coin, here you can buy Coins that can be used for all in-app items.

This is the Pro Version for TVlc Free. - No Ads - No limitations. - Battery saving performance. Enjoy Internet Television with TVlc. Thank you for your support. Run Vlc media player and enjoy a new Television experience. - > 3000 Online radio stations completely free to play. - Browse, bookmark, search, share and play millions of Youtube Videos! - TVlc is a more anonymous way to watch Youtube than Youtube Remote from Google*. - Watch and listen to your own local Video or Audio collection. - Bookmark internet radio stations, or videos from any public source. - Use TVlc as a DVD remote control to play your favorite discs. - If your computer is equipped with a TV receiver of some sort, like DVB, you can also watch conventional TV. TVlc is a very simple way to have ONE remote control for all kinds of multimedia needs. Run two Vlc server for your Home Cinema and your Home Music entertainment. Create your own mix of Music, Movies, Clips, Shows, ... for the evening with a few tips of your finger. Easily share your newest findings with your friends. Complete Home Entertainment =========================== TVlc brings all the necessary functionality to watch Youtube Videos just as with Youtube Remote from Google. It brings everything you need on a DVD remote control. It lets you play all your music on your best audio equipment and all your videos on your best displays in the house easily. So, are you still watching Youtube on your Laptop while sitting in beside your huge fancy television set? Then it is time to embrace real easy Internet supported Home Entertainment with TVlc. Let's see, how does Google promote Youtube Remote and if it applies to TVlc? ============================================================================ - Turn your Android device into a YouTube remote control! - TVlc definitely does! - Control the YouTube experience from the comfort of your couch! - Well, it's a mobile. So yes TVlc completely does. - With YouTube Remote, you can use your Android phone or tablet as a remote control for YouTube videos on your desktop computer or Internet TV. Yep, that's TVlc. - Not sure who that actor is? Want to hear more songs from this artist? Click on the ‘Topic’ button for a world of information about the video you’re watching. description: My T-Mobile altijd dichtbij met de My T-Mobile-app. Of je nou een abonnement, een zakelijke aansluiting of een PrePaid hebt, met de My T-Mobile-app heb je direct inzicht in je verbruik, je facturen, je abonnement of je PrePaid-tegoed en veel meer. Log in met je standaard My T-Mobile gebruikersnaam en wachtwoord. Meerdere aansluitingen? Dan kun je die allemaal toevoegen. Wat kun je met My T-Mobile 3.0 ? - Bekijk je persoonlijke verbruiksoverzicht als je de app opstart - Houd controle met een uitgebreide en verduidelijkte verbruikstatus - Koppel je contacten aan je verbruikstatus en zie wie je gebeld hebt - Vul makkelijk je MB's aan als je door je tegoed heen bent - Bekijk je facturen en de betaalstatus - Bewaar je facturen in bijvoorbeeld Dropbox of Google Drive - In het abonnementsoverzicht zie je direct of je kunt vernieuwen - Het bundeloverzicht maakt het mogelijk om je abonnement continue te optimaliseren - Beheer meerdere My T-Mobile accounts - Voor prepaid is er een handige link naar online opwaarderen Nieuw onderdeel: Service Naast de bovenstaande verbeteringen hebben we ook het kopje Service toegevoegd: - Gebruik de Toestelhulp om je toestel helemaal naar je wensen in te stellen - Persoonlijke service nodig? Vind een T-Mobile Shop bij jou in de buurt. - Direct antwoord van enthousiaste klanten en medewerkers krijg je via de T-Mobile Community. Je kunt je vraag ook via Twitter stellen. - Heb je feedback voor ons? Gebruik App Feedback en wij doen ons best je feedback mee te nemen in de volgende versie. Toestemmingen De app kan toestemming vragen voor de volgende zaken: - Toegang tot je foto's en camera om persoonlijke foto's in te stellen en je verschillende accounts te herkennen - Toegang tot je contacten om je verbruikstatus te personaliseren - Toegang tot je GPS om T-Mobile Shops bij jou in de buurt te vinden - De mogelijkheid om je pushberichten te sturen. Deze toepassing gebruiken we bijvoorbeeld bij onderhoud of als je kan vernieuwen. Voor alle toestemmingen geldt dat we ze alleen voor de My T-Mobile-app gebruiken en ze niet naar ons gestuurd worden. My T-Mobile always close the My T-Mobile app. Whether you subscribe, you have a business connection or a PrePaid, the My T-Mobile app gives you direct insight into your consumption, your bills, your subscription or your prepaid balance and much more. Log in with your default My T-Mobile username and password. Multiple connections? Then you can add all. What can you do with My T-Mobile 3.0? - View your personal usage overview when you start up the app - Maintain control with a comprehensive and clarified usage status - Link your contacts to your usage status and see who you called - Fill your MB's easy if you're going through your credit - View your invoices and payment status - Keep your invoices, for example Dropbox or Google Drive - The subscription list see you directly or you can refresh - The cluster survey makes it possible to optimize your subscription continuous - Manage multiple My T-Mobile account - For prepaid upgrade is a handy link to online New feature: Service In addition to the above improvements, we have also added the cup Service: - Use the Device Helps to completely set your device to your needs - Personal service required? Find a T-Mobile shop in your area. - Direct response of enthusiastic customers and employees get through the T-Mobile Community. You can also ask your question via Twitter. - Do you have feedback for us? Use App feedback and we will do our best to take your feedback into the next version. Permissions The app can request permission for the following: - Access your photos and camera to set personal photos and recognize your various accounts - Access your contacts to personalize your usage status - Access to your GPS to find T-Mobile shops in your area - The ability to send you push notifications. This application we use including maintenance or if you can renew. For all permissions is that we use them only for the My T-Mobile app, and they are not sent to us.
release_text: - Je eerste account in de My T-Mobile app kan je toevoegen door middel van netwerk authenticatie. Zo kan je makkelijk je eerste account toevoegen zonder elke keer je username en wachtwoord in te vullen. - Travel and Surf fix: Mocht de melding niet meer kloppen dat je in NL zit dan kan je het nu nog een keer proberen. - Travel and Surf fix: Koop knop op de verbruiksstatus pagina werkt weer

description: Murder.... we hate it, we fear it, we loathe the people who commit it and yet no news story gets more press than a murder. No book subject is more popular than the tales of murder. If you love history, great lists, facts, trivia and are fascinated by true stories of murder then you will love this app. It is simply a collection of great lists, facts, stories and articles related to murder. A few of the items included are: Victims of Jack the Ripper T hree Degrees Of Murder Female Serial Killers Murder of Lee Harvey Oswald Assassination of Gandhi Assassination of James A. Garfield 1993 World Trade Center Bombing Murder of Elijah P. Lovejoy The Assassination of Rasputin The Black Dahlia Murder Case School Killings Disgruntled Worker Murders Best Mystery Novels of All Time Anwar Sadat is Killed Athletes Charged with Murder Murdered Popes Murder Victims by Weapon Serial Killer Ted Bundy Murder of Julia Martha Thomas Lincoln Assassination Timeline 10 Worst Serial Killers Assassination of William Goebel Why Women Kill Murder in the Laboratory Rwandan Genocide ........and many more. All items are stored on your device and does not require WiFi.
release_text: Several new lists added or updated.

The Locale Bluetooth On Connect condition plugin lets you choose settings on your Android device based on the connection, or lack of connection, to Bluetooth devices. This Locale Bluetooth condition plugin will allow you to automatically change settings on your Android device based on connectivity to Bluetooth devices. For instance, perhaps you want your favorite voice notification app, Enhanced SMS & Caller ID+, to start up with certain settings when your Bluetooth headset connects. Or when you start your car and your device connects to your in-car Bluetooth, you may want the device volume to max out. The possibilities are endless! Note that this is a plug-in for Locale and requires that you have Locale installed. Locale is sold separately by two forty four a.m. LLC. This Locale plugin should also be compatible with Tasker (which is sold separately by CRAFTY APPS). Please report any bugs, suggestions or feedback directly to us through email. Unfortunately, suggestions and bug reports in market comments will be ignored since we cannot follow up with you. Please contact us directly for refund requests within 24 hours of initial purchase.
release_text: • Fixed an issue where the plugin would randomly lose your condition settings. • Added more ways to detect Bluetooth connections. Contact us for help or with your feedback/suggestions. The only way for us to improve this plugin is with your help. Please don't hesitate to contact us!

description: Watch hours of Ice Road Truckers, Pawn Stars, Ancient Aliens, and more. All of your favorite HISTORY shows are available wherever and whenever you want, right on your Android devices. The HISTORY app is a great new way to access full episodes and clips from all that HISTORY has to offer. New content is added all the time. PLEASE NOTE: HISTORY CONTENT IS ONLY AVAILABLE TO STREAM IN THE UNITED STATES. The HISTORY app allows you to: •Watch full episodes and clips of your favorite HISTORY shows including Pawn Stars, Vikings, American Pickers, Swamp People and many more. •Create a customized Watchlist of your favorite shows. •See exclusive clips from HISTORY shows, never before shown on television. •Explore the Topics section for a selection of clips about the most fascinating categories of history The HISTORY app is free to use. If your TV provider is supported you can sign in and get access to even more content including live TV. More TV providers coming very soon! Please note: This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. To learn more about the digital measurement products and your choices in regard to them, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.
release_text: We have a big update for all you HISTORY fans! Our app has a fresh new look and we can't wait for you to see. Also fixes a bug for some Samsung phones As always, we love your feedback. Drop us a note with any suggestions, problems or feedback: watchapps@aenetworks.com

description: Train your brain and math skills with this game! Solve math tasks and get to the highscore. The rules are simple: You will get different math tasks (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division). To solve them, click on one of the four presented solutions at the bottom of the screen. Only one solution is correct. For every correct answer you will get a point. If the answer is wrong a point will be subtracted. You have 200 seconds for the game! It is an addicting and funny game for those that like to play games for free. It is a great educational math trainer and mental workout for kids and students. If you like other puzzles, sudoku and number games you will love Math Training Game - the best math workout for Android!

Port of DOS game Star Control II, with enhanced graphics and music. The Ur-Quan Hierarchy have won the war and put the Earth under slave shield. Explore galaxy, gather resources, ally with other races, battle enemies and win your freedom back. If selecting "New game" crashes the game - select "Load", there is one savegame saved at the game beginning. Two-player melee supported, with two on-screen joysticks. USB gamepads and SHIELD are supported. To activate emergency escape unit, press Back. To change on-screen joystick to PC-style arrow keys - go to Setup -> Configure Controls -> On-screen Joystick, and set it to Classic (PC).
release_text: Fixed crash when starting new game, and music remix pack not installed.

description: Put tubes of the same color to make squares. Created square will disappear and you will get a score. You will get additional score for speed of creation. From level to level number of tubes will increase. And number of squares you have to create will increase.

Mehr Live-Fußball im deutschen Radio gibt es nicht! – Auf SPORT1.fm hört ihr alle Spiele der 1. und 2. Fußball Bundesliga live, kostenlos und in voller Länge. Übertragen werden außerdem ausgewählte Highlights aus Europa League und DFB-Pokal. Jeden Sonntagvormittag gibt es auf SPORT1.fm den Volkswagen Doppelpass. Unsere SPORT1.fm-Reporter sind garantiert Fußball-verrückt und lassen euch mit Sachverstand und Begeisterung hautnah dabei sein. Dank detaillierter Spieldetails und Statistiken seid ihr immer auf dem neusten Stand und bestens informiert. +++ FUßBALL LIVE Erlebt alle Spiele der 1. und 2. Fußball Bundesliga kostenlos und live – in voller Länge, einzeln oder in der Konferenz. Wir bieten darüber hinaus die Übertragung ausgewählter Highlights aus folgenden Wettbewerben an: DFB-Pokal, Europa League und Spiele der deutschen Nationalmannschaft. Jedem dieser Wettbewerbe gehört im Menü der App eine eigene Ansicht mit Spielplänen und Tabelle. RUND UM DEN SPIELTAG Auf SPORT1.fm gibt es das Rundum-Sorglos-Paket: Alle Spiele live – dazu Analysen, Hintergrundberichte und Interviews. Immer frisch, immer ohne Blatt vor dem Mund. SPIELDETAILS & STATISTIKEN Verfolgt alle wichtigen Spielinfos: alle Tore, gelbe und rote Karten, Mannschaftsaufstellung, Telegramm, (Blitz-)Tabelle, detaillierte Statistiken wie Torschüsse, Pässe, Ballkontakte, Fouls, Zweikämpfe u.v.m. +++ Weitere Funktionen der App - Umfangreiche Einstellungen zur Verbesserung der Streamstabilität und -qualität wie Buffering, automatische Streamanpassung und Reconnect oder die Möglichkeit, einen Stream länger vorzuladen - Aktiviert "Erinnerungen" und lasst euch z.B. 5 oder 20 Minuten vor einem Spiel an den Anpfiff erinnern - "Nachhören" der besten Ausschnitte und Interviews im Audio-on-Demand-Bereich - Teilt den Stream mit euren Freunden vor oder während eines Spiels, beispielsweise über WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter oder E-Mail +++ Bei Problemen mit der App schickt uns bitte eine E-Mail, damit wir schnellstmöglich reagieren können. Wichtig ist, dass ihr uns mitteilt, welches Endgerät ihr verwendet, welche Betriebssystem-Version auf eurem Gerät installiert ist, in welchem Netz (WLAN, mobile Daten) ihr unterwegs seid und welches Problem genau auftritt. Kontakt unter radio@sport1.fm – danke für eure Unterstützung! +++ Vielen Dank für euer wertvolles Feedback zu unserer App. Alle Kommentare und Rezensionen werden aufmerksam gelesen und tragen zur Weiterentwicklung bei. +++ Bleibt mit uns in Kontakt Homepage: http://www.sport1.fm Facebook: facebook.com/sport1.fm Twitter: twitter.com/SPORT1fm More live football on German radio there is not! - On SPORT1.fm you hear all 1st and 2nd division Bundesliga live, free and in full length. In addition, transferring selected highlights of Europa League and DFB Cup. Every Sunday morning there is on SPORT1.fm the Volkswagen one-two. Our SPORT1.fm reporter are guaranteed football crazy and leave you with expertise and enthusiasm at first hand to be there. Thanks to detailed Match Details and Statistics you are always up to date and well informed. +++ Soccer live Experience all 1st and 2nd division Bundesliga free and live - full-length, individually or in the conference. We also offer the transfer of selected highlights from the following competition at: DFB Cup, Europa League games and the German national team. Each of these competitions heard in the App menu own view with game plans and table. AROUND THE Matchday On SPORT1.fm there is the all-inclusive package: All matches live - this analysis, background reports and interviews. Always fresh, always without mince. GAME DETAILS & STATISTICS Keeps track of all the important game information: all goals, red and yellow cards, team's formation, telegram, (lightning) table, detailed statistics such as shots on goal, passes, ball contacts, Fouls, duels and more +++ Other features of the app - Extensive settings for improving the stability and quality as Stream Buffering, automatic adjustment and Stream Reconnect or the ability to summon a stream longer - Enables "memories" and let yourself as Remember 5 or 20 minutes before a game to kick-off - "Simultaneously hear" the best and interviews in audio-on-demand area - Divides the stream with your friends before or during a game, for example, via WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter or Email +++ If you have problems with the app sends us an email, so we can respond as quickly as possible. It is important that you notify us which terminal you use, what operating system version is installed on your device, in which network (WLAN, mobile data) you are traveling and what problem exactly. Contact with radio@sport1.fm - thanks for your support!   +++ Thank you for your valuable feedback on our app. All comments and reviews will be read carefully and contribute to further development at. +++ Stay in touch with us Homepage: http://www.sport1.fm Facebook: facebook.com/sport1.fm Twitter: twitter.com/SPORT1fm

The object of the game is to remove adjacent blocks of the same color until all blocks are gone. Every 5 levels a new colored block is introduced. You can slide the blocks to the left or right by swiping your finger horizontally over the screen. You can also turn the blocks upside down by swiping upward. HP File Manager is a file management application that provides file browsing, copying, cutting, renaming, printing and other functions on local storage/USB drives/SD Cards. If there are multiple applications installed that can open a file, HP File Manager allows you choose which app to use. HP File Manager depends on device format support (e.g. if your device can read but not write NTFS volumes, HP File Manager will only allow you to read from the volume).

The hit game series with over 150 million plays is here! Hanger is a ragdoll physics swinging game where anything can happen! It's like Spider Man meets Happy Wheels! Use your rope to swing your way through each level but try not to lose any limbs along the way! Enjoy the incredible realistic ragdoll physics and rope swinging mechanics with smooth and responsive controls that's miles ahead of all other rope swinging games out there! Unlock cool new characters as you swing along like Tarzan, The Tarantula, Robotto, Zombie Grrrl and more! - 75+ levels with different themes! - Choose your character and unlock more! - Normal and Endless Game modes! - Catchy soundtrack by Boy vs Bacteria! - Challenge Mode with different challenges! - Swing through the levels Spider Man style! - Unlock new Endless Levels and Levelpacks! - Super smooth ragdoll physics gameplay! - No IAP purchases! "Sometimes you just want something that's fast, easy to play, but still has something to offer on the production side and has a cool mechanic, I think this is it." - Toucharcade.com "Hanger’s fundamental gameplay is very good and its weird, dark bent is intriguing." - 148apps.com "Hanger is the perfect time waster to pull out between quick tasks, or to compete with friends or family." - driodnerds.com "Thanks to its immaculate gameplay and terrific art style, Hanger is a worthy addition for any casual or hardcore gamer." - Apptudes.com “Hanger is worth checking out. It’s fun, fast and even a little off-putting in a horror movie kind of way.” - Appolicious.com ** This is the free ad-supported version of Hanger without any IAP! Please buy the premium version if you want to get rid of the ads! **
release_text: Tweaks and fixes! Also, we have listened to your feedback and the Hangers are now stronger than ever! (meaning that the body parts don't fall of as easy as before :) Keep on swinging & Like us on Facebook :) https://www.facebook.com/ASmallGame

description: Are you telling the Truth or are you Lying? This Lie Detector Polygraph app monitors your pulse, movements and also your breathing level - All from holding your fingers on the screen! "It works nearly every time!" - How it works: *Hold your fingers on the screen while either thinking about something or saying something. *The app will then monitor you and give live feedback! *Once it has finished monitoring it will tell you whether you were Lying or telling the Truth! You can use it on friends and family too, or even that person you like! Catch people out or find out what they really think! In order to give you a free app and keep developing more free apps in the future, we are integrating a search tool to our application. This will add a few access points to your device (hence the permissions) to direct you to the web search service. Please consider using the search to help us keep creating apps. You may delete the search icon, bookmark and homepage easily. Thank you

Remove that niggling doubt. Double check your drug calculations for safety sake! Dosage Calc is an initiative to assist in the avoidance of drug errors. To do this it provides the following range of calculators for the health care professional to double check his/her own calculations: Volume of Liquid IV Drop Rate Number of Tablets IV Volume Rate Fluid Maintenance Dosage Calc works when your mobile is in "Flight Mode" making it very unlikely to interfeer with any equipment. The application is being offered free during the initial pilot. Please note that it is not intended to be used as the primary source for drug calculations. If your calculations disagree with Dosage Calc, please consult another authority in order to resolve the issue.
release_text: The new version features more decimals in calculations, back button and clear buttons for calculations. More features coming soon. Thanks for all your feedback.

description: Get 4 models and 3 landscapes with this value pack edition of our Absolute RC Heli Sim, for big savings compared to buying them one by one. In addition to the included content, you can still buy extra models if needed. This Professional RC Helicopter Simulator is a must have for anyone flying RC. The models fly like real RC helicopters, and can be used to learn to fly and to improve your flying. A lot of fun for not much money! Any helicopter crash cost many times more, and you will be able to fly in the rc simulator no matter what is the weather outside! The app is based on our well known ClearView RC Flight Simulator for PC. The program includes four models: Blast CX - beginner coaxial model, self leveling and stable, good for making your first steps. Twister Coast Guard - scale coaxial model, for beginner to intermediate flyer. TRex 450 - collective pitch electric helicopter. Very hard to learn, if you fly this one, you can fly them all. We have included beginner setup, in addition to settings for intermediate and advanced 3d fliers. C46 Sea Knight - twin rotor scale electric helicopter with collective pitch. It is a big model that flies in scale like fashion. You will also get 2 free models: Advantage - 4 channel electric plane trainer Rebel Boat - fast RC boat The program includes 3 flying fields: Osage Park Tangamanga Island Fliers The program includes 3 interactive object sets that can be loaded on any flying field. The interactive objects can be used for learning landing and precise model control. In addition to the fixed point camera that represents the RC pilot point of view, we have included follow up camera that allows for walking behind the model. That is useful when you just start, so the model never gets away. Notes: 1. This is not a game. You are controlling flying rc models that reacts like real flying models. It takes some time to learn, and again, do not expect "arcade" style controls. 2. In addition to the free content, the app provides more than 40 extra models as in app purchases. 3. The onscreen control sticks are just indicators! They are made small so they do not obscure the screen. *** You do not need to keep your fingers on them *** Sliding your finger any where on the right screen half affects the right control stick , the same for the left screen part - sliding finger there moves the left control stick. We suggest to select beginner settings at first few days before you can comfortably progress further.

You must download, install the AirWatch MDM Agent available in the Google Play 2. Blacklisting Apps 5. Whitelisting Apps 6. Internal Storage and SD Card Encryption

description: A Mandolin Chord Analyzer, or Reverse Chord Finder. Place dots on the fingerboard to form a chord; the application tells you what chord is formed, and which notes are voiced with each finger. Also, you can show a scale on the fingerboard to aid in arranging and understanding your chords. This version only works for GDAE tuning. For more features, check out our Mandolin Chord Cracker Pro App! 70 chord types, extensive chord library in any tuning, staff and tab views and more! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.capellbrothers.chordcracker.pro.mandolin Excellent independent review (of the Guitar version) here: http://androidheadlines.com/2013/04/featured-app-review-guitar-chord-cracker-pro.html Many more features, charts, and support for other instruments and tunings, at ChordCracker.com Keywords: mandolin chord analyzer library chart finder namer calculator reverse any alternate tuning
release_text: v1.2 - March 3, 2013 - Added many more recognized chords (70 altogether), improved interface, added capability to display multiple interpretations of the same set of notes. v1.3 - March 6, 2013 - Implemented Android buttons v1.5 - April 9, 2013 - Added sound v1.7 - June 2, 2013 - Added harmonic and natural minor scales, gives free pro trials v1.10 - April 27, 2015 - Fixes text and display problems on new hi-res devices, detects chop chords, fixes trial bug.

description: Totally free... No in app purchase... No advertising.... Just play...We are working for 5 stars, so please :) This game has HD resolution. It will slow, if you have old device. Recommended for 2-5 year olds. Explore Bunny Hill and meet Bikki Bunny and her friends! * Play hide and seek games in hidden object style * Visit the Beauty salon * Help Bikki in the garden * Be a Bunny doctor * Play Music game with the Bunny Band * Play Puzzle games * 5 scenes * 10 Puzzle games optimized to HD in older device can be slow....

Play an insanely addictive puzzler on your Android device! Featuring entirely new puzzles, modes, interface, and game play! Relax and enjoy the stunning glass-like puzzles or the gritty wood pack. We have many other great Google Play games available. Just type in 'Big Fish Games' for more fun and adventure! description: Die bekannten Pixi-Bücher als App! Gewinner des MOMMY AWARD in der Kategorie Apps für Kinder (www.netmoms.de) Nominiert für den AKEP (Best Performance in Electronic Publishing) AWARD - großartiger Vorlese- und Zuhörspaß - viele lustige Animationen und Sounds - Vorlesetext zum Ein- und Ausblenden - Bilderpuzzle - Pixi-Basteltipp - Pixi-App-Extra: eigene Tonspur, auf der Kinder und Erwachsene eine eigene Geschichte aufnehmen können! In einem großen alten Haus erscheint jede Nacht ein Nachtgespenst. Es kann eine Menge Tricks: kalte Luft pusten oder an der Deckenlampe schaukeln oder Kopf abnehmen und verstecken. Aber es hat auch immer Hunger! Und das Beste ist: Wenn man ihm Gespenstergeschichten vorliest, gruselt es sich! Eine lustige Gespenstergeschichte von Bestseller-Autor Erhard Dietl ("Die Olchis"). Wir sind daran interessiert, unsere Apps kontinuierlich zu verbessern. Senden Sie Anmerkungen, Verbesserungsvorschläge und Fehlermeldungen per E-Mail an apps@carlsen.de , damit wir schnell antworten können. Allgemeine Bewertungen gerne direkt unter "Bewertungen" posten. Vielen Dank! The known Pixi books as an app! Winner of the MOMMY AWARD in the category Apps for Kids (www.netmoms.de) Nominated for the AKEP (Best Performance in Electronic Publishing) AWARD - Great reading and listening - Many funny animations and sounds - Reading text to show and hide - Images Puzzle - Pixi Hobby Tip - Pixi App Bonus: an extra soundtrack can record your own story to the kids and adults! In a large old house every night a night ghost appears. It can be a lot of tricks: cold air blow or rock on the ceiling lamp or remove the head and hide. But it has also always hungry! And the best part is, if you read to him ghost stories, it delves into the horrors! A funny ghost story by bestselling author Erhard Dietl ("The Olchis"). We are interested in improving Apps continuously. Send comments, suggestions and bug reports via email to apps@carlsen.de , so we can respond quickly. General Reviews welcome to post directly under "Reviews". Many Thanks!

Number Lines help students to visualise the counting process. This game includes counting in steps of 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 and 10. On the first screen you can choose which number line you would like to try. Once chosen, a screen with the number line along the bottom will be shown with Grey Olltwit standing above. The setting is a park and a football is kicked by a Brazilian footballer! Unfortunately the football accidentally strikes Grey on the back of his head and sends his false teeth flying onto the number line. The teeth then bounce their way to the first number shown in the question at the top of the screen. Using the arrow buttons at the bottom of the screen, the student must then add or subtract the second number in the question. Once all the questions are answered in a number line then the student will be able to choose to try another line or collect a certificate. Can be played landscape on a phone but best played on a tablet. Suitable for UK Key Stage 1, 2, 3, 4 & 5 - USA 1st to 12th Grade (Age 5 - adult) Grey Olltwit Educational Programs: - Simple design makes them suitable for all, including Special Needs students e.g. ADHD, Autism, ASD etc. - Suitable for all ages. No furry animals or pre-school graphics - Certificates and/or High Score Tables reward good effort - Made in England by an Englishman No adverts. No in-app purchases.

--Note-- The 17 track website completely updated their site, so it is necessary to update the application , please remember that this is an UNOFFICIAL app , your patience is appreciated. If you have a problem uninstall and reinstall the app . --------------------- This application allows you to store and manage the data of your orders and track them to find out which place they are now. It is an unofficial version of the website (www.17track.net) so I do not take any credit for the tracking service they provide, which is excellent. Whether you're an enthusiast in online shopping, a businessman or an occasional buyer this app is perfect for you as it lets you know the location of your orders in just a few taps and in a few seconds. This application works with data tracking Postal Mail about 120 countries (eg China Post, Singapore Post, Hong Kong Post, Correos de Mexico and many more). As well as private companies package tracking such as DHL, UPS, TNT and Fed Ex.
release_text: Version 3.1 Bug fixes If you present a problem uninstall the application and reinstall.

description: Battle the Undead Necromancer King and his army of monsters in this mini 3D Chess Variant! Utilize your own dark minions - The Shade Bishop, Assassin Knight, Witch Queen, Wyvern Rooks, Skeleton Pawns and completely unique pieces like the Cyclops and Dwarf. Choose from 5 starter colors, and unlock "Dead" for a bloody look to your zombie battlefield! ★Features include: !!! Online player vs player with leaderboard top scores!!! - 3D board and pieces with the ability to rotate to any view - Play 1 player against a computer opponent - 2 player local (tabletop) mode - Android Tablet/Nexus support - Retina display support - Graveyard 3D environment - Undo move button - Save and load previous games - Varying computer opponent difficulty ★What people are saying about NightChess Online: "It's the Chess they play in Hell!" "Awesome new game! Very creative and a fun new spin on classic chess. I love NightChess!" "It was about time someone came up with a good chess game both for kids and adults. Great Job!" NightChess is a fast and fun "Chess Variant" app, with unique pieces to create a unique strategy from standard Chess. A smaller board and fewer pieces speed along games, but don't be fooled, the challenge is still there! With adjustable computer AI and online player vs player, it's easy to increase the challenge. Great for kids as well, the 3D Board and pieces are colorful, with interchangeable colors, eerie music, and easy controls- just tap to move, swipe to rotate the board, and pinch to zoom in and out! Brought to you by Triceratapps Publishing, creators of "Dwarven Chess" and "Armies of Zatikon", NightChess is just the gateway into the turn- based strategy of these other app titles. Try them all!
release_text: - Online Player vs Player mode added - Tabletop (Local) 2 player mode available- Play with friends face to face -"Current Leaderboard" added for high scores and top players -Innovativve "online Bot System" added -Online 2 player matchmaking system integrated- Play with friends online by searching and entering usernames - "R.I.P ADZ Tombstone Icon"- Purchase of full version removes HD Video ads from playing before the start of online games, for player and opponent.

description: Guess the pictures of different celebs. Divided into 18 levels you will find 360 VIPs. For every VIP you will receive 100 points if you've quess directly correct. For each failed attempt you will lose 5 points. Do you have a small (typing)error, 2 points are substracted. For every VIP you can use 2 hints. Hint No. 1 substracted 7 points, hint No. 2 substracted 10 points. You have to buy hints with stars, stars you can get if you solve a VIP good (+1 Star) or perfect (+3 Stars). We have integrate Swarm with a leaderboard and a lot of achievements. In the leaderboard section you can check how you have currently ranked the world! We are working on more Levels.
release_text: v2.2 ---------- - 20 new Celebs (Level 19) v2.1 ---------- - 20 new Celebs (Level 18)

description: Read your Brazil news quickly. Read the latest news from multiple online sources. If you would like to add other sources, please notify us. Features: - List and grid views - Swipe to read next article - Add widget for news source - Download articles and images or prevent them - Offline reading - Favorite and share news - Control update interval - Download using wireless only - Search articles - Backup and restore news feeds - Control feed font and image size - Change theme and font colors - Show/hide toolbar buttons - Notifications for new updates - Auto update or manual update Current sources: - G1 Globo - Google News - UOL.com.br - Terra.com.br - Veja.com - Estadao.com.br - EXAME.com - Zero Hora - Folha Vitória - Carta Capital - Valor Econômico - Le Monde Diplomatique Brasil - EBC - Carta Maior - Brasil de Fato Logo created with the use of mapsof.net images.

description: Turn your phone into a real thermometer using the built-in sensors of your device. Measure the ambient temperature, the humidity, the health conditions of the environment, and display the data of all other sensors of your device. No network connection required. No permissions required. Lifetime return policy! All sensors data are displayed: · Temperature · Humidity · Health Conditions · Altitude (using as altimeter the barometer sensor) · Pressure · Light Level · Magnetic Field · Acceleration · Rotation · Proximity Additional features: · 6 different widgets that can display the time, date, temperature, and humidity · Select the startup screen with the tab you prefer · Lock the orientation of the app · Set your preferred temperature unit (°C, °F, or K) · Set your preferred altitude unit (meters or feet) · Set your preferred pressure unit (mbar, mmHg, or inHg) · Change the update rate of the widgets · Read the info of each sensor (range, delay, power usage, and more) Optimized battery consumption: The sensors are used only while the application is running. Once you pause or exit the application all sensor listeners are removed. You can also customize the widget update rate to optimize consumption for your needs. Note: This application uses the ambient temperature and humidity sensors, which are currently included only in Samsung Galaxy S4 and Samsung Galaxy Note 3. The Galaxy S5 unfortunately does not have either a temperature or humidity sensor, however you can display the data of the rest of the sensors. In case you need anything simply send us an email at support@moletag.com . Our friendly team is always here to assist you. In addition, if you are not happy with the app or if the app doesn't work with your device just send us your order number and we will instantly refund you. We offer a lifetime return policy.
release_text: Version 1.3.1: · Added more pressure units (mbar, mmHg, inHg)

description: Need a Pebble Smartwatch? http://getpebble.com (This is the ad free version of Coffer for Pebble (Free). All the same features, just without the ad banner) Overview: -A perfect place to store your personally generated watch faces. -Categorize watch apps into watch faces, apps and games -One touch install directly to your Pebble smart watch -Add your most used watch apps to your "My Coffer" list for quick access -Quickly add a picture to your apps -Add an app by entering a web URL, scanning a QR code, clicking on a web link or even by opening in a file explorer Details: Not sure where to put all your personally generated watch faces? Want to save all those mini games for later use? Coffer offers a versatile and intuitive way for you to keep track and store all your favourite watch faces, apps and games. Instead of always browsing web sites to find and restore your favourite watch apps, simply store them in Coffer and install them directly to your Pebble with a single click. You can quickly populate Coffer with Pebble watch apps already stored on your Android device, by browsing the web on your device and clicking on links to watch apps, by scanning app QR codes or by manually entering web URLs. You can even add a picture to remind you of exactly what the app looks like! As soon as you select a watch app, the app's name and summary will automatically populate in Coffer! If you are ready to take control of the Pebble watch apps you use and love, give Coffer a try.
release_text: Version 1.1.7 -Coffer will check the PBW of each app and indicate whether it is SDK1, SDK2 or not present (thanks to Pebble Helper by Matthew Tole) -Fixed some bugs that were crashing the app when choosing screenshots from the device.

description: ♥ Pink Rose Live Wallpaper♥ is beautiful wallpaper for your mobile. If your favorite flower is pink rose than this free app is a must have. Decorate your phone screen with lovely images of roses. “Pink Rose Live Wallpaper” offer you free wallpapers of beautiful pink roses. Show your love with pink roses. All roses convey warmth, affection and love in varying degrees. But the incredibly beautiful pink rose is the most popular and beloved of all. Show your emotions with pink rose bouquets and rose photos. Follow the installation instructions: Home ➤ Menu ➤Wallpapers ➤ Live Wallpapers • Includes different animated wallpapers. • Very easy to use just tap once to preview the background image and hold to set the background. • Set as wallpaper or as screen saver, horizontal orientation is fully supported. • HD wallpapers compatible with 99% mobile devices. • Optimized battery usage, supported sleep mode. • Completely free wallpaper for your screen. • Wonderful 3D wallpaper is just a click away from you. The “pink rose” is undeniably the most beautiful among all the roses. Pink roses are generally looked upon as the flower of sweet thoughts and gentle emotions. For hundreds of years the rose has been widely recognized as a symbol of love, sympathy or sorrow. Pink color is as beautiful and as graceful as the delicate blossom, perfect for Valentine’s Day. These pictures of roses are the best possible way to say ‘Happy Valentine’s Day’. Whether it is a rose bouquet of 100 roses or one single rose your funny valentine will be thrilled when she sees these awesome photos of roses on phone screen. The pink rose, especially, a single pink rose simply expresses, ‘I love you’. Bright “pink roses” are interpreted as the ultimate expression of romantic and abiding love. Their bright pink shade expresses these emotions perfectly. The most obvious and well known meaning of the pink rose, as expressed by their lovely color is happiness and joy. The pink rose express fun and happiness. Amazing ♥ Pink Rose Live Wallpaper♥ is a click away from you! Whether you like garden roses or wild roses you can have a picture of pink rose tree on your screen. High quality background picture of roses is everything you need! Pink roses images will fall on your screen like beautiful pink rose petals. This amazing app for Android™ and Samsung Galaxy device is completely free, so download it now, and share pink rose wallpapers with your friends! With this stunning “live wallpaper” you will enjoy beautiful pink rose flower images. These awesome flower pictures bring you the most amazing “rose wallpaper”. Get these brand new breathtaking pink rose pictures and enjoy the beauty of pink roses. Find ♥ Pink Rose Live Wallpaper♥ on app store and download it right now. Share free wallpaper with your friends and family and enjoy beautiful pink roses wallpaper on your phone screen! This magical pink rose image and inspiring HD pictures will make you happy. Pick your favorite pink rose pics and set “pink rose wallpaper” as background image or as a screen saver. Although many people think of standard roses when they think of roses, the rose flower is actually incredibly diverse. Looking for a specific rose? ♥ Pink Rose Live Wallpaper♥ offers you all types of roses. There are over 100 species of the rose. There are heirloom roses, climbing roses, miniature roses, groundcover roses, English rose, tea rose, rose of Sharon, Christmas rose, Floribunda rose and more rose flowers. *Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. *This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Samsung.

description: Flip, Grab, and Grind your way to the longest runs and highest scores in Transworld Endless Skater! Choose from five top pro skaters, each with unique skills, trick lists, and goals, as you play toward getting them on the cover of Transworld Skateboarding Magazine! Endless levels challenge you with an ALL NEW endless way to play - Target Score! Pile up as many points as you can, hitting score targets to add extra time on the clock! How long can you last? More tricks, more combos, more fun than any other skateboarding game out there. Go for huge air, long grinds, and big flips! But watch out...you can also take some huge spills! Awesomely stylized graphics pull you into the action as you weave through the halls of the school, or jump across huge roof gaps! Look for hidden bonuses and pickups in levels to boost your scores! Real pros, real gear, real FUN! - NEW Score Target gameplay mode! - NEW Missions, Tricks, and Boosts! - Endless level design and randomized objects! - Play as pro skaters Danny Way, Sean Malto, Lyn-Z Pastrana, Christian Hosoi, and Ryan Decenzo! - Upgradable stats to expand gameplay, combos, scores, and performance! - Discover and master over 30 different grind, grab, spin, and flip tricks with endless combinations! - Wireless Bluetooth Controller Support for Classic Game Controls!
release_text: * Updated Google Services * Fewer Ads * Compatibility Fixes * Fixed In-App Purchasing - Fixed text issues in French, German, Portuguese and Japanese - Fixed bug that prevented the saving of progress on some devices. - Added support for Standard MFi controllers. - Simplified lane change controls. - Added Trick Box Helper Icons.

description: SClock Live WallPaper is a stylished clock on your own wallPaper. Why a Live WallPaper and not a homeWidget? Because it respects your battery life. description: EVERYBODY who uses their Google Phone Camera needs this app. Learn how to become a better photographer using your phone's camera. BeBetter has been developed, tested, and proven as a “Visual Design Workshop” - and designed specifically to make you a better photographer using your Smartphone. · BeBetter gives you a “seeing experience” - designed to train your eyes to recognize the basic elements of Visual Design. · BeBetter shows you how to use your Google Phone as a sketch pad. Much like a painter you will begin to MAKE better photographs - not just take pictures. · BeBetter is FUN - urging you to play with your camera, make notes, and capture amazing photographs with daily instructional updates. · BeBetter is for amateur and professional photographers alike. · Download BeBetter App now and GO PLAY!!
